text:
I'm one who never like dentist. My experience was good at the start. Smiles and friendly staff. Xray was excellent, the young lady makes you comfortable and smiles. Physically/oral examination was good, Dr. Explain and answer the questions I had, Explain the few issues she think I had. She suggested a deep cleaning. Deep cleaning is something I heard before and my experience was not good and had sworn never to do it again.. With the smile and assurance I gave in. Got nummed only to be told my insurance couldn't cover 😥😥. Now I feel bad. My whole mouth is nummbed and nothing was done.
Not happy at all...

Recommend highly! Thanks Dr M and staff!

name: Bruno T.
text: I used to dread a dentist's office, actually breaking out in a cold sweat every time I had an appointment. Now, after 70 years of fear, I no longer hesitate or shy away from my appointments. Don't get me wrong--- I don't look forward to office visits, but I go without hesitancy. The attitude change is all due to Dr. Maniscalco and his professional staff.

resp.text: Oh Bruno!  What a wonderful review!  It is always our pleasure to see you and we're so glad you feel the same!

name: Kathleen Troup
text:
These are the most caring and competent professionals I’ve ever had the pleasure of working with. Kindness and compassion must be their office credo.I recently had extensive restorative/cosmetic work done. I’d been told for decades that I would need this, but who do you trust to reconfigure your whole mouth?! Dr. Maniscalco has the gift to do so. When a dentist begins to work in your mouth, you have a “sense”, a feel for his level of confidence and competence. There is a deftness and capability in Dr. Maniscalco’s touch. He assures your comfort, and works seamlessly and cordially with all his staff. I am still in disbelief at my transformation—the joy of having functional teeth (NOT DENTURES, thank goodness...) and teeth that are beautiful!! Never in my life did I believe this could be accomplished, and I will be forever grateful. If you have dental needs, please consult Dr. Maniscalco. He and his staff will work with you to accomplish your best results. You won’t be sorry! It is life changing, not just because of their incredible expertise, but because they are remarkably wonderful people and you will be a better person for having known them. They have my admiration and gratitude.

will probably never lose my dread of dentistry, but these folks are most compassionate. They have taken extra time and made much effort to make sure my dental needs are met. I actually now look forward to going to the dentist!! Dr. Maniscalco and his staff are top notch.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Kathy!  It is always a pleasure to see you!

text: I had a cleaning here a little while back.  They were very thorough and it was my first time getting a cleaning without metal tools but with this water jet thing.  It was MUCH more pleasant.  The only downside here (which isn’t much of one) is the toothbrushes they give out have a toothbrush head the size of a child’s toothbrush.  It’s really a cute little thing.  Just was surprised to see it. Lol Also, I still don’t understand why because my insurance hasn’t changed, but at my other dentist, cleanings were completely covered by my insurance. But here I had a co-pay.  That being said, they were very kind and did their job well.  My teeth felt amazing afterwards.

name: Mike Gibbs
text: Fortunately, I only had to have my regular cleaning and exam, but you could not ask for a better experience.  The staff is courteous; my hygienist was thorough but friendly; and the dentist did his thing quickly and professionally. Plus, their rates are the most reasonable around this area.  What more could you want?!?

resp.text: Thank you Mike! We appreciate you trusting us with your dental needs!

Christy, my hygienist, bless her heart, she was just a sweetheart, so friendly, and attentive and it was a pleasure to meet Dr. Draiss as well. I am beyond excited to write this review. If you, your family or friends are in need of a dentist, please consider the team at Chelsea Comprehensive Dental.

Carlye Creamer

text: We were coming in from out of town and my crown snapped on my front tooth. They worked me in and even saw me early since we got into town earlier than expected. name: Randy Wedel
text: I was in Gulf Shores on a family vacation and chipped a tooth. Concerned that I might have cracked the tooth I searched for a local dental practice that could help in a hurry. Thanks to Google reviews I lucked out and found Dr Edwards and Doctor Long. I was in the chair quickly and Dr Long did a thorough evaluation and gave me three options. Since I was there I chose to have the tooth repaired. 20 quick minutes I was fixed and on the way back to the beach. Painless, professional, and very kind. Also thanks to Lu Lu for scheduling me in so quickly and assisting in the procedure. I can assure you If I lived in the area, these would be my dentists. Thanks again Dr Long

resp.text: Randy, we so appreciate the 5 STAR review!  Here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry we try to accommodate our emergencies so that they may enjoy their vacations!  We hope you had a great time at the beach!

name: Aubrey Bianco
text: The women at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry are kind, caring, and very professional. The office space is beautiful and clean, and they take responsible COVID precautions to keep everyone as safe as possible. They all had my best interest at heart during procedures, whether that was a simple teeth cleaning or tooth filling. Dr. Mary was even willing to fit me in for an additional filling the same day, even if that meant cutting her lunch a little short....oh, and not to mention, that was on all on her birthday!! I recommend these ladies to anyone and everyone visiting the island or living here full time!

resp.text: Thank you Aubrey for the sweet review:)  We appreciate you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and glad we can help!

name: Matt Mcclane
text: Absolutely amazing family of dentists. Always polite and very helpful have always got me right in especially if it’s an emergency I drive over an hour to see them every time. The only dentists I will use.

resp.text: Thank you Matt for the 5 STAR review!  We hope you are well and call us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry if you need anything!

name: Sue Ann B
text: I would give them 10 stars if I could 😀!  I called with an emergency when I broke my tooth and they were able to get me in.  Everyone in the office was so kind and caring.  Kim took the time to explain everything they were going to do and stayed with me through the entire process.  Dr. Long was amazing and one of the best dentist I have ever been to!  She was able to repair my tooth and made sure I was comfortable during the procedure.  I would highly recommend them!  They represent the best of the best of Gulf Shores!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sue Ann! It was a pleasure to treat you here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and look forward to seeing you again!

name: Pat Nadolski
text: My husband and I spend winters in Gulf Shores.  On New Year’s Day I broke a molar and was very concerned about finding a dentist.  No worries, we were able to make an emergency appointment to see Dr. Mary.  What a positive experience!  Everyone was professional and best of all friendly, showing a genuine interest in getting to know a little about me personally.  I highly recommend this practice.  We will definitely return here for all of our dental needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, we enjoy having you as a patient here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Shelly Sharkey
text: An awful experience. Easily spent 45 mins in Dr Pamela Edwards office without ever even speaking to the doctor and basically just lectured at and sent away with no resolution. Called a different dentist the same day and within a week, my daughter has had a full exam, xrays and multiple apts completed and has her front teeth fixed and her smile back, which everyone deserves. I was just dumbfounded that the doctor wouldn’t even come out of her personal office to speak to us as a new patient in her office, and the condescending treatment by her assistant or hygienist or whoever she was, was mind blowing.  Let alone the issues to even get an appointment scheduled in the first place and then it was the “wrong type” appointment I was informed when we arrived. Don’t worry about my too complicated daughters case Dr. Edwards, it was easily resolved by another Dentist willing to take the time.

resp.text: Hi Shelly, We would like to apologize for your negative experience. We’re normally known for our exceptional patient care, and we regret that we missed the mark. My name is Bryan and I am the office manager. If you’d like to discuss this further, please contact me at (251) 500-1025 so we can work toward making this right.

name: Glenda Sickles
text: This dentistry office is incredible.  I'm a Snowbird in Gulf Shores, Alabama and had a bridge fall out.  Away from home with a dental problem...what to do?  Family Dentistry has an ad in the local paper that they  love winter guests and accept emergencies.  I was both!!  They gave me an appointment the next day, took impressions, pulled a tooth and in three weeks I had a new bridge.  Dr. Mary Edwards-Long is kind, compassionate, and all procedures were pain-free.  She is friendly and we visited like old friends.  Her assistants, Kim 1 and Kim 2, were equally caring and efficient.  The whole office was careful with Covid 19 practices in place.  I can highly recommend this dentistry office!

resp.text: Thank you so much Glenda for the stellar 5 star review!  We so enjoyed having you as a patient this winter here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry  and hope you stop by to say hello when you return next winter!

name: Renee Ziegelbauer
text: It was a very satisfying experience. Got an appointment right away and everyone was very friendly. Dr Edwards fixed my broken tooth as good as new and I never felt a thing. I recommend this practice highly.

resp.text: Thank you Renee for the stellar 5 star review!  You were a pleasure here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry and we hope you have a wonderful time in our small beach town!

Thank you ladies for all of your effort and making both hubby and myself less stressed about an already stressful situation.

resp.text: Mrs. Trimpey, Thank you so much for the 5 STAR google review!  We are happy we could help in your time of need and please come visit us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry if you are ever in the area again to say hello:)

I highly recommend this dentist office.  The dentist, assistant, and office staff are exceptional.  Wish they were in my home state.  I’d switch dentist if they were.

I am especially grateful for their professional/gentle/educational approach; very thankful for all their assistance in working with our confusing insurance issues!

I highly recommend Dr. Edwards and her excellent team; looking forward to their services in the future.  So happy to finally having all of my teeth & maintaining my smile!

The absolute most reliable, friendly, and efficient dentist and staff you’ll not just find in Gulf Shores, but in Alabama. Period.

text: If I could rate their office more than a 5 star, I absolutely would. I had a cleaning done and 2 fillings last week, and it was such a great experience. I would recommend here to anyone. Both Dr. Edwards's are amazing and their wonderful staff. I have more dental work to get done and I don't  plan on going anywhere else but here!! Thank you guys a million times!!

resp.text: Thank you, hope to see you soon here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry .

name: Carol Fountain
text: It was last Friday I saw Dr Mary Edwards. I was in a lot of pain from a problem tooth and my regular dentist was not open on Friday..Dr Edwards was a God-send to me. I was able to get in to see her right away and she and her staff were able to determine my problem, refer me to specialist , and give me an antibiotic prescription to get me by until I could be seen by my regular dentist in 4 days. Her office is warm and welcoming and I would switch dentists if my insurance would let me. Cannot say enough good things about the whole experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry .

name: Betty Kelley
text:
Came to Gulf Shores for family vacation.  First family drama was my bridge falling out.
I also have a terrible fear of dentists.  Thank goodness for Dr. Edwards.  They had me fixed by 10 am Monday morning.  They could not have nicer, more professional and caring.  I wish she was in my hometown. Dr. Edwards and her staff are the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much, we are here if you need us again at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Dana Given
text:
Just came from my first visit at Dr. Edwards office. Everyone was great; from the initial appointment phone call two days ago;  to check in today (even when there was a glitch with my insurance); to X-rays, teeth cleaning, and follow up with Dr. Edwards.

Very professional and friendly staff; respectful with the glitch - which got resolved while I was in the dentist chair; gentle and thorough dental care.

It’s always scary trying to find a new dentist when you relocate - but I can highly recommend this office - whose entire staff obviously cares about their patients.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Kathlene Smith
text: If you need an emergency crown replacement as I did,  this is the place to go! this is a family strong dental business and they treated us like family as well!  Thank you for your excellent service and care!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kathlene!  You are part of the Edwards Family now and we hope y'all have a wonderful trip!

name: Judi Farmer
text: I’m from out of town and went in for emergency help. Dr. Mary treated me and she is awesome! She diagnosed a cracked tooth and treated me on the spot. Dr. Mary and her staff were super caring. They even gave me a piece of king cake and a box of valentine chocolates when I left. What a super family team!

resp.text: Judi, we so appreciate the kind review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry !  You are part of the Edwards Family:)

name: Edward Williams
text: I was on vacation with my family when I chipped a tooth. Started thinking of a good story to tell my friends about how it happened. My wife said to call around to see if anyone could fix it. Dr. Edwards and her staff fit me in that day! Prices were fair and the doctor was fantastic. I was walking out smiling. Would recommend to anyone needing emergency or cosmetic treatment!

resp.text:
Dear Edward,

We are so happy we were able to help you in your time of need!  It was a pleasure to meet you and  your family.  We hope the rest of your vacation was wonderful and please stop by to say hello to us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry whenever you are back in the area!

name: Sarah Halford
text: We are visiting the area and my husband was incorrectly diagnosed by the minor med clinic after a week and 2 visits.  Dr Mary and her staff were able to see him right away, discover the real problem and get him on the road to recovery. The whole staff were knowledgeable and very caring. We will highly recommend their office to others.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Jash Yotes
text:
The Edwards run a fantastic dental practice - whether it's locals or out-of-towners with dental emergencies.

Pamela and Mary so thoughtful, intelligent, and excellent at making patients feel welcome & cared for.

They're great with locals, (I'm one, ha!) but they've really distinguished themselves in what they're willing to do to accommodate all the visitors that we have in town with their dental emergencies. (And are the FIRST to tell folks on the phone that they need to go elsewhere [like the emergency room] if the problem sounds like a medical priority.)

Anyone on the fence should feel excellent about trusting the Edwards. They're a great, skilled, family run practice that are going to look out for their patients' best interest first.

Love you guys!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Kinsley Lively
text: Such a wonderful experience!! I’m usually a little nervous about dentist appointments but the staff here was so welcoming and friendly. Dr. Edwards, the younger one, was so knowledgeable about my concerns (wisdom teeth coming in) and Star did a phenomenal job cleaning my teeth!! Pearly whites for the win! 😁

resp.text: Thank you, hope to see you again here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

I like to just say this is the best and most friendly dentist 🦷 office around
I just had work done and very professional
People 5 stars if I could give 10 stars I would
Highly recommended !!

Sincerely
Mike

name: Vincent Odom
text: This office was great.  They worked with my crazy schedule to get me seen and their rates were very reasonable.  On top of that, their staff was very personable and polite.  I definitely recommend this dental office.

name: kristin kilborn
text: Wonderful and friendly staff. Just moved to the area and I have found my dentist. I must say I was a little nervous and they put my mind at ease!!

name: Kirk Flowers
text: Had a tooth that my dentist at home had been monitoring for the last few check ups. In the first week of my winter vacation, it broke off. Got an appointment the next day with Dr Edwards and 7 days later, she installed a crown. It feels great. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks for the five-star review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry . We really appreciate your support.

name: Rachel Pody
text: A great lady dentist that is caring, fun, and funny. I was very happy with my visit. Dr. Mary Edwards  was extremely professional, skilled and friendly. The office was very clean, modern, and at the same time felt like a home; which is a huge plus. On my first visit which was an emergency I could tell that the staff cared and I wasn't just another patient but a human being that was in pain, and they empathized with me and wanted to help me(Very different than one of my visits to a different dentist in town). They even took the time to make small talk with me. Every visit since then has been great. Strongly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the lovely google review Rachel of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

name: onakay
text: Amazing service! So family friendly, patient, and genuine. I was unable to get work done due to the fact that they don't accept Medicaid, but their excellent service honestly made up for it! When I get official dental health coverage, I will certainly be returning 💕💕

resp.text: Thank you! Can't wait to see you again here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Thomas Francis
text: Great experience! I am a snowbird who broke/cracked two molars with very old large fillings. I was able to get a same day appointment with Dr Edwards. She conducted a thorough examination and we had a frank discussion about courses of action. I chose to have two crowns. Within a week I had two new crowns. Dr Edwards and her staff were polite, professional, and extremely competent. I would and have recommend Dr Edwards.

resp.text: Thank you for the lovely google review Mr. Francis of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

name: Whitney Day
text: This will definitely be my go to dentist from now on! I had an awful toothache and they got me right in and the very next week got me in for a cleaning! The staff is so sweet and personable and made me feel completely at ease!

resp.text: Thank you and thank you for the referral to us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry!

name: Jennifer Farris
text: Amazing staff and wonderful doctor. Was there on vacation and I had recently had a root canal done at home before going on vacation. I had extreme pain for the last few days of my trip.  I called to see if they could work me in, they got me in immediately.  Turned out the molar behind the tooth I had the root canal in was cracked.  Since I was leaving the next day it would be nearly impossible to fix the tooth, since I needed it crowned.  They took care of me the best they could and sent their findings to my dentist back home.  I would highly recommend this practice!!!  Thank you so much Dr. Edwards!!!

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer for the review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Aaron Frazier
text: On vacation and dental emergency day one. We called Dr Edwards office and they worked us in as if we were regular patients. They saved the rest  of ourvacation once we realized an abscess tooth causing the issue! Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you so much, we are here if you need us again at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry.

name: Holly Howell
text: What a wonderful staff!  Professional, courteous and were very understanding to my fear of the dentist.  The work  I have had done on my teeth has been phenomenal.  I recommend Dr Edwards to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you for he kind review of us here at Dr. Pamela Edwards Dentistry , you're so kind.

name: Betty Myrick
text: I can't say enough about this Dentist.  Dr. Mary Edwards is awesome, as well as her staff!!!!! I broke a tooth in half with exposed nerves while vacationing over Fall break.  I am so thankful God led me to this team!  I have a fear of dentists from childhood and an even bigger fear of needles.  They got me right in as were were being evacuated from hurricane Michael!  The staff treated me with "kid" gloves and pampered me.  Dr. Edwards made sure I would experience no pain and for that I was very Thankful!!!!!  The secretary helped my husband book a hotel as I was being treated.   I just can't say enough about this team!  Thank you all so much!!!!!!

text: I've never left a review before, but this dentist truly deserves one! The staff was incredibly friendly and as a young adult, going to a doctor for the first time alone, they made me feel so comfortable and welcome! resp.text:
Hi Local Guy,

Thanks for your feedback however, we are unable to verify any of the information you have described nor can we locate your name in our patient database.

We take customer feedback very seriously so if you could contact our manager directly at mrstoothdoc@hotmail.com so we can resolve this issue as a matter of urgency.

Many thanks

text:
They got me in quickly for a cracked tooth extraction. They were able to use the X-rays I had already paid for from my referring dentist. Am home now only feeling dull pain have not even taken the codeine prescribed for me.
So far (day one) happy with the experience

text: Excellent service and professional staff. I had oral surgery today and the experience was outstanding. I recommend University Oral & Facial Surgery clinic to handle all your needs present and future needs.

name: Della Minor
text: Dr Carlson done a wonderful job on my tooth extraction. He had the best bedside manner and listened to my concerns. The office staff was polite and caring as well. I like to thank them for their help with the unbearable pain I was having with the tooth.

name: Morgan Watson
text: Everyone I came in contact with was above and beyond nice! Made the experience as good as it could’ve been, considering I was scared to death. 5/5

name: Ralph Bauman
text: These folks are EXCELLENT! I was missing several upper teeth and they explained various alternatives,  including implants. I chose implants, and Dr. Fairburn explained the procedure and successfully put in two implants. It was painless. He is very gentle  and works well with his professional staff. University Oral & Facial Surgery is very clean and the entire staff is very professional and courteous, which is important during this Covid crisis. I highly recommend Dr. Fairburn for your oral surgery needs. Incredible.

name: Ricky Whitt
text: Amazing staff, very professional an make you feel so comfortable knowing I was nervous lol but my first ever experience and they made it look so easy!!!!

name: Lory Hiler
text: Dr Link was great. The office is very relaxing and makes you feels at ease. The staff was great too. Thank you for taking care of me

name: Danielle Guido
text: Dr. Crawford and his staff were so friendly and made my experience so comfortable!! I have severe dental anxiety and the staff were so helpful and accommodating to my needs!!! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who is looking for an oral surgeon!!

name: Suzanne Clement
text: Well coordinated, limited wait time and I really liked Dr Link and staff

name: Mariah Barkley Sullivan
text: I called and made an appointment almost 3 weeks ago to have a tooth extracted while under general anesthesia. I asked about prices for the procedure and inquired about getting an implant down the road. The lady I spoke with gave me a quote for everything including the bone graph required to have an implant done when healed. The price she gave me was $415, I do have dental insurance, but it still seemed lower than I was expecting. I asked her again to make sure I heard her correctly and wrote down everything she told me. Well I get there this morning and the Dr comes in to go over everything they are going to do and then another lady comes in to go over pricing again and get my payment info. She informs me that she saw the quote I was given in my notes, but she didn't know where the other lady had gotten those figures because they were not correct. She informs me it was going to be $992 for the exact same thing I was already quoted the much lower price of. I told her that I was not paying that price so she does some figuring on the computer and tells me $650ish without the bone graph to which I replied, I'm still not paying that price, she needs to go talk to the lady who quoted me the other price. She walks out for a few minutes and comes back in and says the other lady is not there today, but they can do everything but the graph for $476. I declined that price again and told her they should have to honor the price I was quoted, especially if it was in my notes. She said they could not do that, that it was just an estimate. Well I'm sorry, being quoted one price weeks ago only to get there today and it has more than doubled, is not an estimate to me. They never said it was an estimate, they specifically used the word quote! Needless to say, I am still dealing with a broken tooth because I refuse to pay more than double what I was told it was going to cost me out of pocket.

name: William Hall
text: Simply a horrible experience. First they lied to me twice. They really are just uncaring and the doctor Link laughed in my face when I told him about my long-term medical condition. At first I thought he was laughing about something else, but was clear. He seems to think my terminal disease that has been confirmed by two of the best neurological groups in the US is a joke. He changed my oral surgery without discussion, so I would need to come back for a second. And in my “unique “ case should not have any care for pain. Now I have to suffer through his malpractice. Simply, don’t go! He should have just stopped before he ever started cutting on me.

name: Jean Smith
text: Great place to go very friendly staff everything was great from start to finish.😊😊😊😊😊

name: Bianca Edwards
text: My experience today was overall a good. The staff was very polite and took safety precautions due to COVID. Mask were worn by everyone. The staff of nurses were professional and in-depth with all questions and concerns. Dr. Carlson also had great bedside manners and was well informed. First time visiting as adult, my experience was smooth with a decent wait.

name: Cynthia Stevens
text: Everyone was wonderful. The only bad experience I had was with the woman behind the desk upfront. The lady just inside the door was wonderful. This was the woman on the far left just inside. She was very rude and condescending. She gave me some papers and told me to run them out to my driver and run back. I am 69 years old and I don’t run anywhere anymore. I still have a 5 star rating because the other people in the office more than made up for her.

name: Joseph Anders Jr
text: I had a broken wisdom tooth for an entire weekend. Saw my dentist on Tuesday. They got me an appointment(due to a cancellation)Wednesday with Dr. Farnham. Everything went wonderfully from start to finish at University Oral and Facial Surgery. The ladies that work with Dr. Farnham noticed how nervous I was and made sure I was comfortable the whole time. Finally the good Dr. had that little tooth devil out of my mouth before I knew it. I’m pretty scared of dentist, but I would go back and see Dr. Farnham and his crew anytime, I just hope I don’t have to go back soon!

name: Brandy Heartsill
text: Fantastic job! I had big back molar extracted and a lot of anxiety about it. The whole team was so nice. So fast and efficient. Definitely put my safety first and my comfort. I couldn’t thank hem enough!

name: Ed Prince
text: This place has to the best oral surgeon in tuscaloosa,  maybe even in the state....very professional. I would recommend them to anyone...the procedure they do you wouldn't even know they're done...IT'S ABSOLUTELY AMAZING...THANK YOU UNIVERSITY ORAL AND FACIAL SURGERY...Really loved it all from the time I arrived...everyone was so nice...GREAT STAFF

name: m causey
text: Everyone from staff to doctors were very professional from the time I entered the office and they were very efficient. My appointment was on time and the procedure was performed as promised.  I highly recommend them.

name: Patricia Bryant
text: Very comfortable and calming environment and a very kind staff. Treated me as if I was the most important patient in the building. I will definitely go back to this office if there is ever a need to do so.

name: John Lewis
text: Great folks. Very nice and professional. I would highly recommend them

name: Ashley Addison
text: Very nice doctors and nurses also very helpful with everything that we need to have also feel very comfortable

name: Shirla Webster
text: I was treated very well by Dr Link and all of the staff here. They were all following COVID-19 guidelines. Every question was answered before I left the office so that my treatment will go smooth.

name: Darrel Jernigan
text: This was a fantastic visit. I went in for an emergency procedure. The office was complying with Covid-19 protocol. Very clean and plenty of space between patience. They put me at ease from the moment I walked in. The staff was courteous and friendly. I didn't have an appointment when I called to see if they were open. They referred me to the nurse before they would see me. It took only 1 minute for the nurse to call me back and get me in. The intake nurse was thorough. She didn't miss a beat. And she was easy to talk to. The doctor was great. He answered all of my questions and to great care to insure my comfort during the procedure. Management made payment hassle free and safe. I could not have asked for a better experience.

name: Jackie Stephens
text:
This was my first procedure at The University Oral & Facial Surgery. The office is pristine. The staff are kind, knowledgeable, and understanding. My procedure went very smoothly and quickly. The doctor and nurses were very aware of my ptsd and treated me with enormous compassion.
The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because I am a breast cancer survivor and alerted  them that I could not have blood pressure or IV sticks on my left arm. My IV was inserted in my right arm, however, when I woke up from surgery the blood pressure cuff was on my left arm!!!! That’s a big no-no as I will now run the risk of lymphedema.

name: Sonja Minor
text: Friendly and professional atmosphere. Dr. Carlson is an excellent dentist!

name: Pat Gregg
text: I was extremely impressed with their organization during this COVID19 pandemic. They had check in perfected, making sure people wore masks, social distanced, took temps, & kept contact to a minimum. The staff was friendly and professional and Dr. Link was very thorough. He explained my issue in a way I could understand & gave detailed instructions. I highly recommend this practice.

name: Stephen Quilliams
text:
I was totally overcharged for two extractions that was coded as surgical but was actually just regular pulled teeth. Charged 640.00 dollars for two extractions. On top of 95.00 dollars for exam and 20.00 for masks and gloves. Said it was because of covid 19. Absolutely the worst place to get teeth pulled,as far as cost is concerned and no sympathy for people who are struggling financially due to covid 19.
.

name: Alabama Choir School
text: This group is made up of pure, helpful, friendly professionals. From the lady taking temps at the front door, through to the nurses, receptionists, all the way to Dr. Carlson, 100% solid!

name: Natasha Wiant
text: I had the best experience with them. They took precautions prior to covid. They worked fast to get each person in and out in a safe and timely manor. With no hesitation they work with you and answer questions quickly for you. I will definitely be recommending them!!!

name: Gabriel Louise
text: Very pleasant and a great group of people.I would definitely go back and recommend the service.

name: cassie simon
text: Wonderful experience. My 85 year old mother is here with me. She does not live here. She’s been stuck here because of Covid.  Not only did they work her in for a serious oral mouth issue, but she had no dental insurance and she got a discounted rate. Everyone was very nice and she remarked to me that she felt good because they referred to her by Mrs. and her last name. A special shout out to Brandy.

name: Mary Parsons
text:
Unprofessional call to make a appointment!

Never been here but I called to schedule a appointment and let’s just say the phone call was enough for me not to go unfortunately.
I called was asked to hold sure no problem I don’t mind holding well the lady forgot to actually put me on hold.
Well I heard their conversation how omg girl the phones won’t stop ringing I already have like 69 sticky notes of names why couldn’t these people get their teeth fixed before the pandemic.
Well I said hello about five time someone one picks back the phone and says can I hold I said absolutely not and told her I heard their conversation and wanted to speak to the manger she says she’s not here I said well let me speak to someone over you finally after asking 3 times she had someone else named Ingrid come to the phone which she was nice and apologetic she said their office is over whelmed with calls since they were closed for 7 weeks which I completely understand it’s a known fact many places are overwhelmed.
But that does not take the place of being professional and doing what job you get paid to do I feel anyways I won’t be using them.

name: Tyreece Hampton
text: Very knowledgeable helpful staff and Dr. Link put together a good plan for me on my dental procedures.

name: Michael Ward
text: Highly professional staff. Dr. Carlson seemed VERY nice. He's a God fearing man and I felt very comfortable in his presence. If you have any maxillofacial work that needs to be done, you should seriously consider University Oral and Facial. They'll make you feel right at home!

name: Traci Morris
text: The surgical staff is wonderful,  but be prepared for a little bit of attitude from the office staff.

name: Tamika Stinson
text: I scheduled appointments for both my children and the day before the receptionist called verifying only one appt. I explained that I had 2 appointments scheduled she could not find the appt for the other child. I ask to reschedule the appt and she said that I need 48 hr notice.(which was a lie based on their website it’s a 24 hr notice. I literally stayed on the phone with this smart mouthed receptionist threatening me with a cancellation fee for their mess up!!! Finally after 15 minutes with this rude person someone else gets on the phone and said they found the other appt🤨!  The day of the procedure they tell me it will be a fee. ( she said they would call later the day prior) Of course that didn’t happen. At the appointment they gave me a price to pay (before they would see one child). I paid it, shortly after I was asked to pay for the other child🤯🤯 after she finished her appointment! One would think they would let me know both prices and pay for them together. Talking about frustrated with these people!!!! Never again!!

name: Stacey Evans
text: Everyone was FABULOUS from check in until the very moment I left. My father was with me and they kept him well informed on me and gave him perfect post-op instructions for me to follow as well as a bag full of information and goodies. I had never taken the medication I was given so I made an after hours call to the on-call nurse and she gave me instructions on how to get the full benefit of the medication to keep me comfortable over the weekend. While I have always been a nervous wreck with any dental work other than a cleaning, the entire staff that I encountered made it a pleasant experience and eased my mind. Thank you to everyone who I came in contact with that day. Keep up the wonderful work!

name: Becky Forrester
text: Dr. Carlson and his staff are so kind and caring. They really know how make you feel at ease. They took great care of my son who was very nervous going in. Thanks to you all!!!

name: Taril Slater
text: Very professional! Get u in and out in no time. Very nice staff as well.

name: Ray Carroll
text:
Dr. Carlson took time to exchange pleasantries without wasting time. Never felt he was “in a rush” to move out and on to his next appointment. He conveys a concern for doing highly professional procedures and caring for the patient.
The very personable lady who guided me out of the treatment room to the billing and waiting areas was a great touch. Not only was she very friendly but particularly in that I wasn’t turned loose in the rabbit’s warren of exam room doors and disorienting hallways to stumble onto the way out.

name: Ricky Burch
text: So professional from start to finish!  Everyone could not have been nicer and genuinely cared about my well being.  Very impressed, and Dr. Clausen is the best!  I hope I dont have anymore tooth problems but if I do, I will be back!  Thanks!

name: shalka ochilly
text: I was really scared going in being 3 months pregnant, but the process was quick and painless. One of the nurses even held my hand to calm me which meant a lot to me. Definitely recommend this office!

name: Bailey Park
text: Very disappointed in my experience. Went in for dental surgery today and the day before, I was told that my insurance covered it and I didn’t have to bring a co pay. I get in the room waiting for surgery and I’m told I needed to pay 1,045 dollars up front before I could get the surgery. No payment plans, no surgery, nothing. I drove an hour to have my time wasted. Don’t recommend.

name: Tina Turley
text: Dr. Links and his staff are lovely.  Handling things as best they can through this Covid 19 pandemic.nice environment.

name: Natanya Vance
text: They always take care of me when I come in. I will never go to another oral surgeon besides Dr. Farnham and Dr. Link.

name: Cody Kornegay
text: I was very happy with my experience here. The staff was friendly and made me feel less nervous about having a tooth removed. The procedure itself went smoothly and was very quick. They answered all of my questions and concerns about recovery. No complaints.

name: Rhonda Lancaster
text: I love Dr. Fairburn! He's the best dental surgeon/medical doctor ever!! I feel safe knowing he is working on my teeth.  I'm fixing to have him do my implants.  I have all the confidence in the world in everyone at University Oral and Facial Surgery.  I'm not scared to go at all!!!!! The office staff is also great and very helpful.  Love them all!!

resp.text:
Rhonda,

Thanks for letting us know that Dr. Fairburn makes you feel at ease. Our surgeon's experience is the cornerstone of our practice.

name: Calvin Williams
text: I just came from here to get extraction for a tooth that has been giving me nothing but trouble. Dr. Carlson and his staff were truly wonderful. I was nervous but was put at ease by the terrific customer service! Thank you very much UOFS!!!

name: Donnie Lee
text: Outstanding service, everyone was very friendly and professional, really practicing social distancing

name: Nikki Hahn
text: The office staff is one of a kind. They are helpful, patient, understanding and very kind. Dr. Fairburn has a great bedside manner and did my procedure perfectly. His support staff listened to my cares and concerns and discussed future plans before proceeding.  I did have to reschedule my apt but it was nobody's fault but my own because I was late arriving. Thank you to the staff and Dr Fairburn for a job well done. I'd highly recommend him and his team and I'll be returning for any future needs myself.

name: Hunter Sexton
text: We waited 2 HOURS for a 2 MINUTE consolation about wisdom teeth removal with Dr.Link. Absolutely terrible. They told us to get there 30 minutes early, so we did. We could’ve been an hour and a half late and still had too long of a wait. We had people that got there later than us go back first. They walked in about a minute before we were gonna walk out. If I could give zero stars I very much would. If you need anything oral or facial, go to Birmingham. You’ll leave and get home sooner than you will here. Not going back. Ever.

name: IAm Shonia
text: I would definitely recommend this place to everyone I know.  Dr. Mcilwain and his staff were very kind and made sure all my questions were answered both before and after our visits.  He made my daughter,  who was the patient,  feel very comfortable.  The atmosphere was very pleasant and clean.  Our wait time wasn't long at all. They also provided an after hours number for me to call in case there were any problems after my daughter's procedure.  So many people are in the medical field because jobs are very easy to find.  What all patients need from their caregivers first is compassion and I can truly say that is exactly what we were shown at this office.

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience with us!

name: JAMES NORRIS
text: Great experience, staff friendly and professional. Practically no wait time. I was in in out within 45 minutes. Dr. Carlson very courteous and professional and explained everything.

name: Kim Carver
text: Staff was very friendly and accommodating. Dr. Carlson is the best always has been.

name: Terry (Lynn) Harrell
text: I am very happy with the service I received from University Oral & Facial Surgery. I was having issues with my wisdom teeth so I dropped by their office to make an appointment. Amazingly, I was able to have the procedure done the very next day. The operation was very fast and painless and, although I was prescribed pain medication to take after the procedure, it was not needed. The follow-up examination was also fast and did not require any additional payment. They even refunded part of my co-pay as the extraction surgery was not as difficult as they thought it would be. I would definitely recommend UOFS to anyone who needs dental surgery.

resp.text:
Terry,

Thanks for taking the time to leave us some feedback about your experience.
We are glad to hear that you were pleased with the surgery.

name: Sonya Blanton
text: Dr. Carlson and everyone I came into contact with here was amazing!  Thank you so much for your genuine care and concern!  I wish I could have all my dental care at this office!  Thank you all so so much! 😁

resp.text:
Sonya,

Thanks for letting us know how we're doing.
Our goal is to deliver the highest level of surgical care to our patients.

Do you think there is anything we could have done to make the experience smoother or more informative?

Regards,
Chris Pereira
University Oral & Facial Surgery
cpereira@uofsdocs.com

name: Tom Blackmon
text: Dr Roe and his staff have been kinda like family.  Whatever I needed, any questions I had and doing their work to my satisfaction.  They really did give me a reason to smile again.  I most likely will schedule visits to my home State of Alabama to retain the service I have received there as I now reside in Missouri.

resp.text:
Tom,

Dr. Roe is a great local dentist!
But I think you might have his practice confused with ours. His practice is right down the street from us.
Thanks for your time.

name: Nicole Samuel
text: I'm hella paranoid of dental offices however Dr. Carlson made me feel at ease. He was very gentle when administering the topical anesthetic and was very knowledgeable. He could probably sense how anxious I was and he was mindful enough to keep involved in the procedure by every once and a while informing me of what he doing in my mouth. All in all one one my most pleasant dental visits in my life. and ALLL the staff were super friendly!

name: Lakeidra Mims
text: Really great staff and wonderful experience. The consultation and procedure was quick and my recovery speedy. I encountered no problems. I had 3 wisdom teeth removed.

resp.text:
Lakeidra,

Thanks for letting us know about your experience.
Do you think there is anything we could have done better? We are always looking to improve.

name: Johnnie Campbell
text: I had a pleasant experience with my visit yesterday. The staff is very friendly and professional. Dr Meriwether is the best. He explained the procedure and made sure that I was comfortable throughout the procedure. I highly recommend this place for all of your dental care.

resp.text: That's great to hear about Dr. Merriwether,  but I think you may have us confused with Tuscaloosa General Dentistry just up the street.

name: Valerie Duncan
text: Dr. Carlson was great and did a wonderful job when I had my wisdom teeth removed.  He was very personable and had an excellent "chair side" manor.  I highly recommend him to everyone.

resp.text:

Thanks for letting us know. It is important to us that our patients feel comfortable during these types of procedures.  Thanks again for your kind words.

name: Chelsie Booth
text: These people really care. They are understanding and smart and try to make your experience with them as painless as possible. Thank you for all your help dr's looking forward for my wisdom teeth extraction. I know i picked the right place to go.

name: Johnnie Knight
text: The staff at University Oral and Facial Dentistry were very curtious, and professional. I recommend them highly and if I had to do it all again I would choose  University Oraand Facial. 😁

Thank you for the great review!

name: Deloris Gray
text: I recommend Dr. Fairburn and this office. They were very caring. My husband had a procedure done and no problem with healing.

name: Gary White
text: Dr John Farhnam took care of a stone in my saliva gland that has been there for at least 3 years with out facial surgery that 2 previous doctors wanted to do.  Done in 10 minutes.  My best doctor experience ever.

name: Crimson Dynasty
text:
We were sent here by our local dentist when he felt that my daughter's gum abscess needed a drainage tube put in her mouth then cut out her back teeth. When the surgeon reviewed the large x-ray, it was decided to remove just 1 tooth and he cleaned out all infection underneath it with hopes that the 2nd tooth will live.
We were also worked in on the spur of the moment because of the abscess. Very grateful they gave her other tooth a chance to live since she's still in her 20's.

text: Fast appointment,safe environment great service.👍

text: Had 3 impacted wisdom teeth and 1 erupted wisdom tooth causing so much pain. Dr. Farnham assured me that the procedure would be a piece of cake and it was. Very happy with the service and worth every penny to have him operate on you!

name: deborah khalil
text: I had 2 teeth extracted by Dr Fairburn. The first of which he had out before I knew anything was going on. The second I was not so lucky.  The tooth  would not let go and come out so it had to be broken up by drilling and removed in pieces . Then came the packing, cauterizing and suturing all of which was not pleasant to say the least BUT Dr Fairburn was amazing, He never lost his cool. He was constantly explaining what was going on and what he was doing which helped to calm me. He even would pause and give me a minute to take a break. I am  not the easiest patient to deal with as I have a fear of dentist. He was very professional but also compassionate and kind which is rarely seen in today's medical profession. I am a RN of 30 plus years and I would recommend Dr Fairburn highly.  He has my utmost respect and admiration.

resp.text:
Deborah,

Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. The surgical staff at University Oral & Facial Surgery strive to deliver an exceptional level of care to our patients.

text: Dr. Hudson and his staff are very professional and courteous. I went in on a Wednesday for tooth pain and told him I wanted to have the tooth extracted. He did a great job and I would highly recommend him for anyone who wants excellent dental care.

name: Melissa Eakes
text: I had a great experience with Dr. Hudson and his staff. The office and rooms were super clean and the staff were all friendly and professional. I came in for a wisdom tooth extraction and was very nervous about the sedation, as it was my first time ever being sedated. Dr. Hudson and his nurses listened to my concerns, and took the time to explain the process. They put my mind at ease, and the entire procedure was over with before I knew it. I would 100% recommend this office.

name: Kevin Dong
text: Very quick and painless

resp.text: Our pleasure! Glad to hear you had a 5-star experience. Thank you for recommending our practice.

name: Latoya Adams
text: Well unfortunately we (my daughter and I) didn’t have the best experience with the nurse at this facility or the front office worker. The Dr. did have good bedside manner in my opinion, however, my daughter did seem to have some unusual extreme swelling even after 48 hrs  following the instructions of icing the area etc. I’m not absolutely sure why this occurred but the office has been emailed and I’m still awaiting a response. I have a rare genetic disease that unfortunately my daughter has the gene for and if not carefully watched certain medications given can turn the gene into the disease. I wasn’t informed what type of medications they planned to give her prior to the procedure when I asked to know the nurse seemed to have an attitude and reluctantly told me to come back to see. While back there talking about the list with the doctor the incompetent nurse proceeded to start my daughters I.V. Instead of at least waiting until we had finished determining if the medications were indeed okay all while rolling her eyes. Which was so disrespectful I can’t even imagine how such a person in a field of care could show such disregard but I guess that’s how she was raised to be. I’m not sure. However, there are two office staff members that are always most helpful that sit on the side. The lady at the front when you walk in was not very thorough she didn’t make sure I had the cost information prior to the day of the procedure in writing (I had to ask for it as well as the code explanations), she also didn’t make sure my daughter had an excuse for school but did offer one to the Caucasian lady that came in after me just not to me for some reason 😒. However the lovely lady on the side provided what I needed which I am most grateful for. As I said there are good staff members it’s just probably half good, half bad but the doctor was nice 50% of his staff I would say need some serious retraining and empathy towards others if they are going to stay in that field or look for another industry where care isn’t essential.

name: Susie Shelton
text: My daughter had severe pain and swelling for more than 3 weeks following wisdom teeth removal in October. We returned 4-5 days after surgery for a re-check. Dr. Hudson had very poor bedside manner and was very condescending to my 22 year old. They also charged $100 over quoted price out of pocket. We had another daughter scheduled for consult but changed oral surgeons and had wonderful experience in December at North Alabama Oral Surgery. We do not recommend Dr. Hudson.

name: Charlotte Sharpe
text: Dr. Hudson was the sweetest and kindest man.  He explained every step he was going to take from when he was making the incision to pulling the tooth.  He and his staff were just precious.  Would highly recommend him.  Charlotte Sharpe

name: Monique Fisher
text: Got all four of my wisdom teeth removed. I had insurance that wasn’t well known & they accepted it. I felt comfortable the entire time. I also got put to sleep and woke up just fine. Recovery was good & it put my mind at ease. Glad they are out & I recommend them!

name: Daniel Marchand
text:
My wife had a fantastic experience here, glad we found a good oral surgeon who takes our insurance (United Healthcare) locally. Everything was billed correctly, great coordination with the insurance company,  great staff, procedure went smoothly (tooth extraction) - happy customer!

The other place (also in-network) we went to charged $81 for an initial consultation (due to incorrectly coding services) plus quoted upwards of $200-300 to do an extraction (same insurance), we paid $66 TOTAL here and the consultation was 100% covered as it's supposed to be.

I hope we don't need to use this place again, but if we need an oral surgeon we're coming back for sure.

name: youknowit158
text: Dr. Hudson has horrible bedside manner! However he is amazingly great Doctor! For me it's more important for the doctor to be good at his job than have a good bedside manner. That's why I gave him a five star. His staff on the other hand is quite friendly and very professional.

name: M N
text: Dr. Clint Hudson was the absolute worst experience with a medical professional we have encountered. His arrogance and lack of empathy made for terrible bedside manner. After removing all four of our 16 year old daughters wisdom teeth on July 3rd, she was in recovery longer than anticipated. I waited patiently until I was called back to sit with her. She apparently hadn’t  tolerated the  Anastasia well. They released her to be taken home while her eyes were literally still rolling back in her head as the nurses walked her out. Over the long holiday weekend, dry sockets formed. I realize this is something that sometimes happens and isn’t necessarily the fault of the surgeon. My daughter was in agony, with pain medication doing nothing to dull her pain. When I called the after hours emergency number, listed on the discharge instructions sheet provided to us, they were completely useless. I seriously don’t even know why they have one. I was rudely told twice, once by the after hours staff member who answered the phone and again by Dr. Hudson himself to “call the office during regular business hours to schedule an appointment. “  At that point, I debated going on to the ER, but decided to have her at Dr. Hudson office as soon as they opened the following morning. We arrived 15 minutes prior to opening, signed in 2nd, only to be “worked in” to the schedule. While my daughter sat in the waiting room in misery, no urgent attention was shown. When we were finally called back, dr. Hudson examined and packed a bottom socket. My daughter did not receive relief as the dr. and his staff insisted she would. She kept trying to tell them the pain was coming from the upper socket which Dr Hudson and his assistant would NOT hear of, nor would he even look at.  They told us repeatedly she was wrong, and the pain she felt wasn’t coming from the upper socket, bc it was basically unheard of to develop an upper dry socket. They also repeatedly tried to get us to leave,  saying she would feel better in 15-30 minutes. I finally stated that I wasn’t leaving with her until I knew she was relieved. Dr. Hudson then SHOVED his hand into the top of her mouth asking “is THIS where you’re uncomfortable?!?” She grimaced and moaned in pain and tears flowed. Even I began crying just watching the scene. I absolutely was in shock and disbelief at what had just happened. Then, he stepped back and admitted it appeared to be an upper dry socket. He also admitted he couldn’t remember the last time he’d packed an upper, and that he didn’t know that he ever had. Once it was packed, she did get relief from the pain within a few minutes. I suppose Dr. Clint Hudson is an adequate surgeon so long as the patient doesn’t have any complications from the surgery, and if the complications aren’t rare or unusual. If there are complications, better hope they only occur during regular office hours. Since there is no way of knowing beforehand if these will occur, I’d suggest finding a different oral surgeon. I believe in giving credit where it is due, and there was an assistant who works for Dr. Hudson named Micki who was very sweet and sympathetic. On the flip side, another who I believe name was Jan was as rude and uncaring as the Dr. himself.

name: B B
text:
A few years ago I was told to visit this office for a cleaning in order to start a program I was applying for at the time. She asks everyone where they work before performing any services and if she thinks you make a lot of money she charges you unfair prices. She informed me that I needed to come back for a “deep cleaning” in which I was okay with. She charged me for both the cleaning performed today, and the deep cleaning that hadn't even been performed yet. Luckily I wasn’t hurting too much from it so I took that L and moved on.

Recently my husband, in desperate need of an extraction, visited her office and instead of pulling the tooth (2 hours before closing), she had him pay her $75 to get a prescription for the pain instead. He went back this morning to ask her to pull his tooth in which she told him he would have to pay an exam fee of $150 in which I know for a fact is not $150 (I recently used to do coding for a dentist office) and to pull the tooth would be $275 (another lie).

He ended up getting an extraction from another office for $110 altogether.

This lady is a crook. Please do not fall victim.

resp.text:
As a professional, I would like to make sure I give this post some attention. I really appreciate the fact someone thought enough about my service to refer you to my dental practice. Its common practice to ask where a person works to determine if there may be any additional benefits or resources they may not have knowledge of their company may provide for their dental care. If a client is not pleased with the services we provide we try to make it right. In addition to that, they are not required to pay in advance for any services not performed.

As for the second statement pertaining to your husband. I am curious why he would seek help from me if you were not satisfied with your prior experience. But none the less as a dental professional I am willing to provide a service.

When a person has a throbbing pain in their mouth it needs to be diagnosed properly.  The first goal is to stop the pain and do a thorough exam once the pain has been relieved! And as for the fee you stated you were charged $150.00. Please note $150.00 is less than $275.00.  Simple or routine tooth extractions cost any were from $100.00 dollars to $450.00 dollars depending on the complexity of the procedure. A surgical extraction requires the removal of gum tissue and or bone. They are time-consuming, tedious, delicate, and cost more! Note this is why an examination is needed in advance.

In closing the statement you made referring to me as a crook is negative, derogatory, and inapprioate. It violates Google review policy. I will address this with the appropriate departmet!

name: SandiB
text: Disappointed. Waited an hour did not receive service in a timely manner. Went for a consultation but needed an extraction. They were not able to tell me how much it would be for the extraction. Only the price of the exam and x-ray.

resp.text:
Dentists and oral surgeons perform tooth extractions for many reasons. The issue may be a painful wisdom tooth or a tooth that has been badly damaged by decay. In some cases, a dentist will remove a tooth to make space for dental prosthetics or braces Sandi.

An oral surgeon, not a dentist, may extract a tooth when the situation is more complicated. In many cases, they extract third molars or wisdom teeth.

Dentists and oral surgeons remove teeth for various reasons. Some examples Sandi are
dental cavities, gum disease, dental infections, trauma or injury to the tooth or surrounding bone
wisdom teeth complications, preparation for a dental prosthesis, preparation for dental braces, if the teeth are very crowded, baby teeth not falling out at the proper age.

This is why we require a exam prior to quoting a price.
We are sorry for the misunderstanding and hope you were able to get the service you needed!

text: Natalie cleans my teeth and she's the best! Dr. Westerman did some cosmetic fillings on white, chalky spots that were on my front teeth after having braces and they look SO good now!

text: I always receive great care by Dr. Maples and the staff at SRD. Everyone is always so friendly! I would highly recommend SRD!

name: Kellen Mataafa
text:
I grew up dreading trips to the dentist. Going to get my teeth cleaned seemed like a necessary evil. Then a couple years ago I made an appointment to the Florence location of Singing River Dentisry. I don’t quite know how to describe it but now I love going to the dentist (it’s possible). Natalie is the woman that cleans my teeth and she is the nicest and most nerve easing lady I’ve ever come across in a medical office. I genuienly look forward to conversation with her during my cleanings.
Dr. Maples has done filling work for me (yes shots and all) and each time I’ve walked away saying “gosh that was so easy!” I now live 3 hours away but I come back here for any dental work I need done. They are truly the best at what they do and are so focused on making their clients comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We are  glad to know that we could change your opinion of dental work and help you feel at ease in our office. Thank you for making the drive to continue to come and see us for all your dental needs.

text: Most thorough hygiene visit ever.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

text: We’ve been coming here for 9 or 10 years now. I love the service and the atmosphere. Everyone welcomes you with a warm smile and greeting. Dr. Teddar, listens to your concerns and will give you a thorough examination. Satsuma Family Dental is definitely the best.

name: Aemanda Landry
text: First I would like to say it's awesome Google notified me this is a women led office. All the staff are females and that always eases me more. Second the issue was with my son. He was 6 and had not one cavity up until now. The whole staff are wonderful and really helped him relax the multiple times we had to come and then finally to have his tooth pulled. They walked him through the whole process and eazed all the anxiety my little one had. If I could give the staff more than 5 stars I would. They worked very fast and effective. The staff maintains a very clean environment and a very welcoming environment. I really applaud these ladies for the standard they have set during this epidemic and helping my family feel better about a scary procedure.

name: Alex Peterson
text: Never thought i would look forward to going to the dentist office. This is the best i have encountered in 30 years.

name: Murray Murphy
text: Highly recommend!   Friendly, very professional and efficient Staff .

name: Sandy Smith
text:
Dr Tedder’s office is the best I have found for children’s dentistry. I started going to her in 2003 with my first granddaughter. I am now going to her with my second grandson although I’m 35 miles away.

Although COVID-19 has changed some things, the care starting at the reception area and continuing through checkout can’t be beat. They are so intuned to a child’s needs it instantly puts them at ease. Prior to COVID they would have several assistants working with your child. They talk to them massage their arms and legs while getting cleanings and fillings. Just beautiful 🥰

They make it a great experience for you and your child or grandchild. They leave happy and unafraid of coming back.

name: Rocquell Besteda
text: The best dentist office I've ever been to! The staff is awesome alone with Mrs Tedder! They make u feel like your at home lol!! I've been with them over 3yrs and they haven't changed a bit!!

text: Simply awesome dentist.  Dr. Tedder and all of her staff are friendly and professional.  I highly recommend them.

name: Tiffany Harrison
text: These ladies from the front desk to the back including Dr. Tedder were AMAZING!!!! Both my boys had a really bad experience with another dentist, and didnt want to go back. I called around to several dentist office to try making an appointment for both my boys and Dr. Tedder was the only one that i could get into see. And I am so glad she was. My boys were happy with their visit too. I wanted to find a dentist closer to home anyway, so it all worked out!  I am so happy I took them to see Dr. Tedder and her amazing staff!! Thank you all for this great experience!!!!

We are very sorry to hear that the problem you were having was not resolved to your satisfaction.  Dr. James and his assistant, Alicia, would be more than excited to see if there are any other options available in hopes that we can all come together to reach the best solution for you!  If this interests you, please let us know so that we can have one of our patient coordinators reach out to you to get you in for quick, but thorough visit to discuss options.  Thank you, Ms. Brenda!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

text: Great dentist using advanced technology! I wish I had found Dr. Tucker way earlier. Professional team with people who make you feel at ease and at home. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a new dentist!

name: PK Jones
text: These guys are awesome. I was totally embarrassed about the state of my teeth after 3 years of no dentist visits, but after their work was done on the first visit, I’m no longer self conscious about my smile and have my confidence back! Check em out!

name: Ira Price
text: Excellent service, pleasant environment

name: Blake Herring
text: Awesome experience with doctor Tucker and his team! They actually made going to the dentist fun and comfortable for our family. They are very kind and courteous folks, I highly recommend to anyone looking for a great dentist who really cares.

name: Jared Spann
text: It has been a great experience with Dr. Tucker, Tina, and the entire staff.  I was a new patient last year, and my main issue was headaches and jaw soreness due to clenching my teeth.  Dr. Tucker did a great job of explaining everything in detail, and he helped me better understand the factors that could be causing my clenching and the solutions available for treatment.  I ended up doing Invisalign, and the headaches and soreness are now gone.  I even noticed that my speech has improved.  Dr. Tucker and Tina were always happy to answer all the questions I had, and I was extremely pleased with the care I received.  I honestly feel like part of a family when I come to the office, and everyone there helps promote this family atmosphere.

name: Trey Pollard
text: Love these guys! I’ve been a patient for 6 years and would highly recommend. Dr. Tucker and his staff take great care of their patients and have created a wonderful family atmosphere.

name: Alaina Ploski
text: I moved to Birmingham three years ago and have been going to Dr. Tucker's office ever since. I searched online for invisalign providers, and their website did not disappoint! Every staff member is kind and respectful, and they make you feel truly cared for when you visit. I have learned so much about dental hygiene and teeth from them because they want you to ask questions  so you know how to best care for yourself. They have a great reminder system for busy folks like me which texts you well in advance of your appointments. I honestly look forward to going to dentist appointments - something I never imagined possible as a kid! I highly recommend Dr. Tucker's office for anyone looking for a dentist.

name: Justin Reach
text: By far the best Dentist you're going to find! Dr Tucker and his staff go way above and beyond any expectations you could expect! Thanks for all you do!!

name: Jason Hyde
text: I drive from Huntsville to see Dr. Tucker. There are plenty of dentists in North AL. Enough said!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us to take of your dental needs. We are honored to have great patients like you Jason!

name: Michaela Kibler-Wald
text: We really love TFD! They are professional, kind, and take care of the patient! They always go above and beyond to make sure I’m satisfied and treat my family like family!

name: Seth Stidham
text: I always have a great experience at Dr. Tuckers. Staff are super friendly and helpful! I never dread going to the dentist anymore!

name: Tyler Watts
text: My wife and I have used Dr. Tucker for several several years and could not be happier.  He and his staff do a wonderful job of diagnosing issues and creating solutions to maintain a healthy smile.  He's even helped me with my snoring problem!  You definitely need to give Dr. Tucker an opportunity to help you and your family.

name: Deepali Bajaj
text: Dr. Tucker is extremely knowledgeable,kind and genuinely caring he will take the time out to explain things by talking with you about your teeth and even drawing out examples of what is happening in your mouth. For a science/medical nerd like myself that kind of effort is greatly appreciated. I am getting invisalign done at Dr. Tucker's office and I have seen such fast improvement of my teeth it's incredible. The staff are all very friendly and genuine, they actually care about their patients.

name: Rachel Marie
text: I'm a fairly new patient of Dr. Tucker and I have to say that my experience so far at his office has been awesome. I've lived in Birmingham for only 3 years and the dentist I had when I moved here retired earlier this year. My boyfriend is a patient of Dr. Tucker and told me how pleased he has been with Dr. Tucker's in-depth knowledge and the way he explains things that impact your oral health.

name: Amy Maziarz
text: Dr. Tucker and his staff take care of my entire family and have for YEARS!  They are professional, courteous and truly care about their patients.

name: Antonio London
text: Was overall a great experience! Everyone was very nice to me and I didn’t have to wait any extra time for anything. Was a great experience and look forward to going back again!

name: Nancy Kinnane
text:
Dr. Tucker and his staff are very caring and make a visit to the dentist easy. The care that they give their patient is excellent and they are always concerned with making it as easy and painless as possible. The office is very friendly and welcoming and you feel like family when you are there.

They have my high recommendation.

name: Melissa Gallagher
text: I want to express that this is the BEST dentist office in the entire world...and trust me I have looked. I have lived in 54 different countries and all 50 states and I will travel far and wide every 6 months to see Dr. Tucker and his amazing army of ladies. One time I flew over 7,000 miles from Southeast Asia just to get my teeth cleaned. Not only are they very good at what they do they are very kind and truly treat you like family. I have been a part of Dr. Tucker's "family" for 21 years and will remain as long as he is willing to keep me smiling bright. I cannot thank this office enough for what they have done for me and my family. If you dislike the dentist then you are definitely doing something wrong because I count down the days to my appointments!!! Keep on Brushin'!

name: brad smelley
text: Amazing staff and Dr Tucker is great! Highly recommend.

name: Brandon Holmes
text: Dr. Tucker and his staff do an amazing job and recommend them to anyone. Been seeing them for 4 years and wouldn't think of going anywhere else.

name: LAUREN
text: Dr. Tucker and his staff are top notch! They go above and beyond making sure each patient is comfortable. I enjoy how thorough Dr. Tucker is and I know he is one of the best around!

name: JBananta Hydroforce
text: If you are looking for a new dentist, look no further!  I had a former dentist perform sub-par work that turned into a painful problem years later.  I walked into Tucker Family Dentistry on 1/11/17 with immense pain and no appointment.  They were booked solid but too compassionate to let me walk out the door in pain.  They figured out a way to give their appointments the treatment they deserved while bending time and space to help me.  I can't thank Dr. Tucker and his staff enough for their giant hearts and professionalism.  I will not be looking for a new dentist until Dr. Tucker retires. I'll probably just bug Dr. Tucker to make house calls.

name: Emmali Lee
text: Dr. Tucker is the best dentist I have ever had. He takes the time to explain in detail your treatment plan and will explain again if you didnt understand something. The staff (Leisa, Mckayla, Tina, Donna, etc) are kind and friendly. They make sure you are taken care of.

name: Melissa Bowman
text: Dr. Tucker and his staff make going to the dentist a pain-free experience! Several family members and friends as well as coworkers are also clients of Dr. Tucker, if that tells you how good he is!

name: Diana Shoel
text: Great Dentist (pain free) and outgoing and friendly Staff!

name: Carrie Hefner
text: Dr. Tucker and his staff are very patient and knowledgeable. Now I don't mind going to the dentist.

name: Greg Shrewsbury
text: Extremely knowledgeable and informative about care being provided.

name: Michele Mills
text: If I could post zero stars I would. The dr is nice enough, BUT I was told to pay 225 $ for a scan of my mouth and that they will file insurance AFTER the fact but just in case ins does not pay that I had to prepay. It has been a month and they have not filed any claims and what makes matters worse is that I was told that this surgeon would be able to treat my facial tmj trauma but he instead referred me to a dr who does not file ANY insurance with ANY company whatsoever and is basically cosmetic. Had I been able to talk to the dr prior to PAYING out of POCKET for a scan that NOONE would even FILE for me with my INSURANCE then maybe I would have known that he would not be able to treat me. ALSO why couldn't he treat this? THIS IS HIS SPECIALTY!? The office staff is TERRIBLE! I have called repeatedly and been told that it has been filed and I can see online it has not plus I have called and nothing has been submitted. I have faxed and mailed paperwork with my portion of the claim filled out and all it needs is the dr portion filled out by their billing staff and again that has gotten me nowhere. My insurance covers office consults 100% and TMJ 100%. x-ray radiology 100%. They said this would not be covered and (office staff) and that is FINE but they can have the curtesy to FILE it like they SAID THEY WOULD! DO NOT USE THIS DR IF IT IS FOR TMJ OR IF THEY TELL YOU TO PAY ANYTHING OUT OF POCKET- REFUSE !

name: Michele Mills
text: UPDATE: have made no progress with this. Have called the office and still received no help. Was told that the person who files insurance will call me back and she has not. If the insurance denied the claim I would be perfectly ok with that but to be told to prepay and told that the office WILL file is being LIED to.

name: kevin harwell
text: I was referred, by my regular DDS, to an Oral Surgeon to extract an infected molar which could not be numbed properly. The referral Surgeon would not treat my tooth because of my high blood pressure at that time. He sent me away in pain to get my HBP corrected by my Dr. and told me to call back in a couple weeks. I saw my HPB Dr. and he adjusted my meds and everything was back to normal, in days. I was in agony and needed treatment ASAP.  I called the Oral Surgeon's office and was still put off for at least 2 weeks. I called Dr. Kamelchuk's office the same day and his staff got me in immediately knowing my obvious discomfort. My DDS sent a referral and I was quickly treated, my pain gone, cured. Dr. Kamelchuk's staff of professionals are the most compassionate, caring, dedicated, cordial, health care folks I have ever had the pleasure to know. Their dedication to medicine and the easing of the concerns of a patient and patient's family are painstakingly put to rest by reassurance. I have been in the Medical/Dental profession for over 40+ years and find this Dr. and staff to be exceptional. My personal thanks to you all.

name: Kaiden Soffes
text: I went in to get my wisdom teeth extracted. I must say, I was very surprised. They treated me with the upmost respect and were very kind to me during the whole process!

name: JD Higdon
text:
Dr. Kamelchuk is the BEST. Hands down, the very best!

I've received excellent care and treatment from Dr. Lee, as well as his entire staff. They're a team, a family if you will... they care for and about people.

I was treated with kindness and respect by Dr. Lee and team from the moment I walked in the door, until my procedures were complete.

The team has gone the extra mile to assure I was properly cared for, even made  courtesy calls to check on my well being afterwards.

Dr. Lee's demeanor is very calming, never rushed or hurried, always has time to answer any an all questions, explains procedures thoroughly from beginning to end.

A very kind, caring, and thoughtful person with an excellent manner.

Thank you!

name: Christel Jones
text: I love this place the staff was awesome and the DR was fantastic he takes the time to explain everything to you and he is so nice it’s really unbelievable until you meet him and his staff all I can say is WOW

name: Kaptev “Kaptev3k” Holmes
text: Omg this place was the best dentist experience I have had in a long time. The took care everything on time and professional.

name: Paul Wilkie
text: I was told that my insurance was NOT covered for this doctor when it IS, the office personnel  went off of the diagnosis of what my PPO wrote on the referral, they gave no thought to make a proper diagnosis and just went off of what the referral said, BUT they were quick to tell me that it would be $190 for a visit and xray. This doctor is nothing short of greedy and a money chaser. Not only would I NOT give them my business, but I am intent on "referring" them to the ADA for malpractice.

name: Michael Smith
text: Excellent shop! Evaluated on Tuesday and implant complete Friday Morning. Professional, fast, friendly. Wish I hadn't needed them, but I'm glad they were there to do it!

name: Travis Love
text: The nurses were very nice and understanding of my condition as I struggle with anxiety. I was terrified to go under anesthesia. Dr. Kamelchuk was very nice and an excellent surgeon. Would definitely recommend this office over others.
