text: Great Doctor! Even walked me out to my Vehicle after Surgery.

name: June Foster
text: The doctor is very business-like and reluctant to answer questions.

name: Judith and David Fields
text: Absolutely amazing Spa experience. I have a monthly facial and besides making me feel pretty; my skin is plump, radiant, and glowing. Thank you to everyone at the Spa for outstanding service...If you want a great facial and this is the place to go.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We are thrilled you enjoyed it!

name: jwrecord
text: This place is the best.  Dr Nizam and the rest of the staff were super nice.  I would give them an 11 with a 10 being the highest score you could normally get.  I would highly recommend Alabama Surgical Arts to anyone needing dental surgery.

text: Alabama Surgical arts is wonderful.  I recently had oral surgery at the facility and the experience was wonderful.  Everyone is professional, answered all my questions and the day of surgery was a breeze.  They did an amazing job and I had  no swelling or issues at all.  I actually live 2.5 hours from there and will definitely travel back if i needed another procedure.

text: Amazing staff, facility, mentality and service. I will never go anywhere else for anything cosmetic or skincare. Truly, will never. text: The facility is very clean and has a welcoming atmosphere. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. I only gave 4 stars because I haven’t been going there long. But, so far, so good!

name: Christian Jackson
text: the doctors and staff are super nice. I was in the waiting room for less than 5 minutes. Once in, they  talked me through my nervousness and gave me a blanket when I said I was cold, which made my overall experience feel less freighting and more enjoyable + comfortable . My procedure went perfectly smooth   and the office looks aesthetically pleasing. cool place. 🤠

name: Kelly toland
text:
If I could give this office 10 stars, I would!! This office is beautiful from the inside to out and it smells amazing.
I have visited the Medspa twice now to see their Esthetician Haley and she is amazing!! She is sweet, personable, and knows her skincare. I will definitely be back for more treatments with her.
Everyone here is committed to great service and are very friendly.

name: Shay Hicks
text: Outstanding customer service and process. So happy with my results! I would definitely recommend for any cosmetic procedure!

text: I was nervous, but had such a wonderful experience with all staff members involved in my care. I had no pain after my procedure and would gladly go back and also recomend  Alabama Surgical Arts to anyone it may benefit! Thank you guys so much for making me so comfortable! Everyone was so nice and I honestly have no complaints.

name: Tara Herron-Olive
text:
I LOVE ASA! They have been absolutely amazing. Lily and Co. are all so professional. I've been going to them for a year for various facial treatments and have been extremely pleased with everything they have done.

name: Tracey Canada
text: Alabama Surgical Arts provides a warm and inviting atmosphere. The facility is beautiful, clean, and very spacious. Each staff member I encountered was equally warm, friendly and engaging. A very professional team. Their customer services is top notch! They provide detailed instructions each and every step of the way. Every question I had was answered with a smile, even behind the masks. 😀. Dr. Sami Nazam, II was a joy to have a Doctor. I was extremely nervous, not knowing who I would be seeing on my first visit, but his aura was kind, caring and confident. Upon reviewing my x-rays he quickly observed a new area of concern, which had not been brought to my attention by the referring physicians, and to their credit, it may not have been noticeable on other visits. However, Dr. Nazam reassured me that he would take care of everything. He and his dental/surgical team all have great bedside manners,. They equally helped to put me at ease with their warm, funny and engaging dialogue. Lastly, Dr. Sami personally contacted me the evenings of each procedure, I was pleasantly shocked and excited to have my him call to inquire how I was doing as the pain was intense. He explained what he saw during the procedures, what was done to resolve the issues, what to expect over the next few days, and how to address any concerns I may further encounter.  Wow!!!  His follow-up actions spoke volumes to me, VOLUMES...! 🙏🏽👏🏽🙏🏽   Thank you for making me feel like a part of your family. Awesome, awesome job Dr. Nazam, and the Alabama Surgical Arts staff. 😀😀😀

name: Patricia Jordan
text: My daughter had her wisdom teeth removed today. She's been around dental almost her whole life (I work for a general dentist). This was different however, this was HER mouth.  Everyone was amazing at keeping her calm. Dr. Nizam explained everything to her so she'd know what to expect during and after her surgery. His whole team goes above and beyond to provide excellent care! Not only keeping the patient comfortable, but mom too!!! Thank you to everyone! Y'all are the best!!

resp.text: It's truly an honor when others in the medical/dental field choose our practice for services. We thank you and hope you have an easy painless recovery!

name: Michael Gresham
text: This place is great and so is the staff! Dr. Nizam called later that day to check if everything was ok. I've never had that kind of customer service from any doctor. Will definitely recommend to others.

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Gresham. We hope you have an easy recovery and a great New Year!

name: Dana Carlton
text: Competent and friendly staff. Nice facility.  Total confidence in Dr. Nizam.  From start to finish I was fully informed about what to expect and all questions and concerns were addressed.  Recommend to anyone needing an implant!

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback. Happy everything went smooth!

name: Emma Boles
text: I had my wisdom teeth taken out yesterday and was very anxious before. All the staff made me feel very comfortable and safe. The office is beautifully decorated as well! Thank you ASA

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We are so happy we could make the experience as easy as possible for you. We wish you an easy recovery.

name: Paige Floyd
text: Alabama Surgical Arts is amazing the whole staff was great!! I went in all scared, but they talk to me and calm me down. I went in to get my wisdom teeth done and before I knew it it was over and I didn’t feel any pain!! Thanks Alabama Surgical Arts!!😘😘

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!

name: Kaysie Paul
text: I had all 4 wisdom teeth extracted today, and the experience was amazing!! The front desk staff, surgical assisting team in the back, and Dr. Nizam were all so nice and very professional. They make sure you are comfortable from the time you get there until you leave. They definitely exceeded my expectations. And I would recommend this place to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you so much. We hope your recovery is as easy as the experience!

name: Jeff Wasserman
text: Great experience with Dr.Nizam and staff. Highly recommend their services and extremely pleased with their professionalism and outstanding service provided.

resp.text: It was our pleasure! Hope your doing well and pain free.

name: Faith Hurst
text: I was very nervous about getting my wisdom teeth out, but the entire staff was very kind and didn’t hesitate to joke and laugh with me to ease my nerves. They answered all of my questions patiently and in a way that ensured I had the information I needed, and a nurse walked me out to my driver’s car to make sure I got there safely. The doctor/surgeon himself, Dr. Nazim II, personally called my family a few hours after the surgery to check up on me. I would also like to point out that the COVID safety procedures were excellent. The woman at the front desk wiped the form-signing tablet before anyone used it, everyone wore masks and used hand sanitizer, and they separated clean pens from pens that had been used. I wouldn’t have wanted my teeth taken out anywhere but here and I highly recommend Alabama Surgical Arts for anyone, especially people with anxiety like me.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear we could make the process as easy as possible on you. Happy holidays!

name: Gene McNeely
text:
I can’t express how thankful and pleased I am to have chosen to use ASA for my recent oral procedure.  The whole experience, including the extractions, have exceeded my expectations!  The entire staff has been completely professional and I really felt as tho they were honestly concerned about my comfort level.  Thank you again for hiring competent CARING people for your practice.  Huge kudos to your Front Desk staff for how well they promote you!!  That’s what sets you apart from everyone else.

Thank you,
Gene M

resp.text: Thanks Gene. Noted!

name: Olivia Molina
text: They have high quality equipments

resp.text: Thank you. Much appreciated.

name: Brittany Wiggins
text: Alabama Surgical Arts is simply the best! If you are contemplating any cosmetic procedures, give them a call--they are more than helpful. Kayla answered a lot of my questions before I even made an appointment and was incredibly professional and kind! Lily and Dr. Nizam are incredible--none of my questions went unanswered and they made me feel comfortable. The results are AMAZING--I can't believe it!! If you are looking for a professional, knowledgeable, inviting staff and state of the art procedures, give Alabama Surgical Arts a call. You won't be disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you so much Brittany. Literally everything you said is what we try to do on a daily basis. So happy we are accomplishing that!

name: Sabrina Sams
text: The entire staff and Dr. Goehring are professional and have great bedside manners. They were courteous and prompt. I would recommend them to anyone for their next oral surgery.

resp.text: Thanks Sabrina.

name: Keith lucy
text: Great staff. I had a good visit. Looking forward to getting my implants completed in 4 to 6 months.

resp.text: Thanks. We appreciate the feedback. Hope you have an easy recovery!

name: Aseel Dib
text: ASA is definitely a state of the art facility. All of their equipment and services are updated and really sculpted to each patients needs. The MedSpa is a fine balance between relaxing and medical grade treatments, which I love! Their diamond glow facial is one of the best facials I’ve ever had. Anyone I have interacted with here has been incredibly sweet and knowledgeable! Going to ASA feels like I’m taking a trip out to LA. Whether you need to be seen for OMFS, cosmetic surgery, or just need an updated skincare regimen and facial, this is your place!

resp.text: Wow awesome review! Thank you. Five stars back at you for using the word sculpted in your review. You pretty much summed up what we are all about.

name: Elizabeth Gunter
text: Very professional I'm pregnant and they made me feel comfortable and safe they were very helpful and careful with make sure my unborn child was safe the actual procedure was pain free and under 40 minutes I have recommended to my family.....

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback. Safety is our top priority, especially when it is for two!

name: Kimmy Stewart
text: This place is awesome and I love the staff. I had my lashes done multiple times and I love them. I made sure I took care of my lashes and they do last for a month which was perfect for me. I love how they work with my work schedule to see me.

resp.text: We are happy to hear you had a great experience. We try our hardest to accommodate everyone's schedule because lets face it; we are all busy and everyone's time is important!

name: Theresa Betts
text: Wonderful atmosphere! Staff very nice and hardly any wait time. Would recommend Dr. Jackson. He called to check on me .Who Does that?

resp.text: Thanks for the positive feedback!

name: Liza Berrey
text: Very professional and also friendly. Very good care. It is a 5 plus office!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback!

name: Janice Taylor
text: I’ve had several occasions that required specialized procedures and I can say that I received the very best care from Dr Goehring and his staff. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Taylor. We really appreciate the positive feedback!

name: Arsa Shehu-Gega
text: I had an amazing experience at the Alabama Surgical Arts. The facility is very modern and all the staff were very attentive and friendly. Lily is outstanding and skilled in a variety of beauty treatments and I highly recommend her!!!! Beyond pleased with my experience!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you had a great experience. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Michelle Hinsey
text: I have a strong fear of dentists and they talked with through the whole dental implant procedure.  Talked with me up until I was out.  Made sure I was as comfortable.  It was quickly done and done well.  Very professional and responsive to your needs.

resp.text: Thank you Michelle. Happy we could ease your fears.

name: Morgan McGough
text: GREAT experience! The office is so clean and organized. The staff was very helpful and Lilly was very professional and I could tell she genuinely cared about my well being. She made a point to make sure I was making the best decisions and informed me of all of the possible side effects before I made any decisions. She was very patient with me throughout all of my questions and offered excellent advice! Dr. Nizam was also very helpful and informative. I will definitely be going back to see them! Highly recommend!!

resp.text: We genuinely care about all of our patients and want the best outcomes for them. Happy it shows in our consultation process!

name: Robin Crowe
text: Dr Nizam and his staff did an excellent job making my experience with oral surgery an excellent one. The staff kept me informed every step of the way, kept me comfortable, and well informed on post surgical care. I really appreciated Dr. Nizam calling that evening to follow up and make sure all was well and answer any questions I had. The office is clean, thorough, and on time without being rushed.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Crowe. We wish you a comfortable swift recovery.

name: Ebony Weathers
text: I had a quick consultation appointment that was less than 30 minutes. I was able to get a scheduled appointment the same week for my wisdom teeth extraction that did not take long. Dr. Nazim also contacted me to see how I was doing the same day as my surgery.

resp.text: Thanks! Happy it was convenient and we could get it taken care of for you in a timely fashion!

name: Debra Howsmon
text: I love these guys,, so professional and very caring,,, makes oral surgery almost pleasant,,I wouldnt refer anyone but these guys,, and I mean every staff member that I have encountered while getting my second round of implants ,,, from my first walk in over a year ago until yesterday I have been wowed by them and everyone of them ,, I am a disabled veteran and I know they must get headaches having to deal with the VA system,, I wholeheartedly recommend this practice,,, Thank You Dr Nigam for allowing me to use your services 😀

resp.text: Very kind. It is truly an honor to get to serve those who have served for us!

name: Kaylee Sides
text: Friendly staff. Got me in for surgery fast & everything went good. Dr Nazim has checked on me and has been an excellent doctor. Highly recommend him & his staff.

resp.text: Thank you for the input. We are so blessed to have patients like yourself!

name: Tiffanie Wilson-Means
text: I love the entire scenery in this place the staff were very friendly Dr.Nizam is the best I got all 4 of my wisdom teeth extracted today he definitely answered all the questions I had I would definitely recommend Alabama Surgical Arts

resp.text: Thanks Tiffanie. We appreciate the positive feedback and hope you have a speedy recovery.

name: Penny Billings
text: It is a pleasure doing business with Dr. Nizam, Lily & the staff of Alabama Surgical Arts. I’m grateful that my pageant coach, Terri Bolen, introduced me to them. Bridgett is always so friendly & very helpful. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them to anyone. In fact, since taking advantage of their services, I have received many compliments on my face.

resp.text: Thank you we are so happy we could help you on your recent journey. Congrats. You look great form head to toe!

name: Brian Bair
text: Great staff who took the time to explain the procedures. They were friendly and interacted well in all areas, I.e. scheduling, checkout. The procedure itself went smoothly and quickly.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. It was our pleasure and we hope you have an easy recovery!

name: Kelsey Richardson
text: Staff was very friendly and helpful! I arrived super early and they allowed me to go ahead and check in and be ready before it was time for me to have surgery. After the surgery, the doctor called me later that day and checked on me. I recommend this place to anyone who wants to be surrounded by a positive and caring environment!

resp.text: Well thank you. It is great patients like yourself whom contribute to that aforementioned positive environment!

name: zina eddy
text: Very professional staff and they make sure that you have a clear understanding of what is about to happen.

resp.text: We truthfully believe communication is one of the pillars of any surgery. Thanks for confirming it!

name: Jason McDade
text: I have ptsd from a previous dental experience in my teens while in the military; it’s an understatement about the level anxiety I have around all dentist and I will go to great lengths to avoid the industry as a whole. Over the previous 1.5 years however, it’s been unavoidable. Both times I’ve seen Dr. Nizam and his surgical staff and on both occasions they exceeded my expectations, and more importantly, understood and addressed my ptsd with the steps they would take to minimize my concerns. I’ve never given a dental review, and this may be my last,  however, Dr.Nizam is great at his craft and highly recommend he and his staff should you need oral surgery.

resp.text: Thanks for the input. Its our pleasure!

name: Sami
text: Always a great experience! I have gotten the Perfect Derma Peel, the DiamondGlow facial, and Microblading.  I highly recommend them.  I especially love my eyebrows.  Thank you Lily!!!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear you are pleased with your treatments!

name: Thomas Moore
text: Excellent recent interactions with Dr. Sami Nizam and his staff for treatment of a broken tooth with a dental implant. Well-run outpatient center with state-of-the-art techniques and equipment. Friendly and efficient staff, from front desk to treatment rooms. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you so much. Hope you have a great holiday weekend!

name: Molly Johnson
text: Alabama Surgical Arts is the best!!! The staff is so talented and friendly. They always make me feel welcome with snacks and refreshments. I’ve had several treatments and have been overly pleased with everything I’ve had done. I will continue to go back and recommend to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. Lets face it walking into a doctor's office can be intimidating sometimes. We try to make it as enjoyable experience as possible!

name: Janie Bowen
text: My experience at Alabama Surgical Arts was great!! I researched surgeons in the Montgomery area and found Dr. Nizam to be on call and right on time just like the Lord himself. I was so pitiful and in the most excruciating pain ever!! He assured me that he could take care of me on the following Monday. His staff also took excellent care of me as well. The office is immaculate and very comfortable. I truly appreciate Dr. Nizam and staff for taking my pain away. If I ever have to have an oral surgery again, I will be back. In addition, I will recommend Alabama Surgical Arts to anyone in need of a great oral surgeon. I have one more wisdom tooth remaining, so I know I'll be back:) Again, I can't thank you enough for being available and following up with me post surgery, that resonated as well. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

resp.text: Thank you so much. It was a pleasure to meet you and happy we were able to accommodate you! P.S. Do the extra stars at the bottom count as 10? ;)

name: Tiffany Ball
text: The office decor is so welcoming, the staff and doctors are kind and gentle.

resp.text: Thanks for the positive feedback. Happy to hear you had a good experience.

name: Cuz
text:
Wonderful service and everyone is young and pleasant
Cost is the same as any other dentist. Had 3 teeth extracted and absolutely no pain!! Thanks Dr. Jackson

resp.text: Thanks for the positive feedback. Have a great weekend!

name: Heather Holloway
text: Dr Nizam and Lily P.A. are extremely talented and skilled. I have had a few procedures and they have been professional at all times and I cannot be more pleased. I wish I had done the procedure years ago. They have top notch equipment and knowledge for anything you need. My fave has never looked better.

resp.text: Awesome feedback. We have both undergone years of training to be able to provide a modern approach to facial rejuvenation. We are happy you are happy!

name: Kayla McConnell
text: Lily is so sweet and down to earth. The office is beautiful and has the most relaxing atmosphere. It is like going to the spa. Montgomery is lucky to have such a top notch office right here in town!

resp.text: Thank you. We try our hardest to maintain a comfortable, clean, state of the art facility.

name: Kitty Wasserman
text: Lily is the nicest! She patiently listens to my concerns and takes time to explain my options, results and creates a plan for my skin care.  ASA is professional , makes me feel comfortable, relaxed and have an enjoyable experience.

resp.text: Putting in the time to make sure we address your needs is what its all about!

name: James Redding Jr.
text: Dr. Nizam and his staff are great!  They are so nice and skilled at what they do.  I would  recommend them to anyone who needs oral surgery.

resp.text: Thanks  for the positive feedback Mr. Redding. It was a pleasure getting to serve you!

name: Robert Lee
text: The best!  The very best!  Professional and personable -- competent and caring.  This 85-year-old guy had a problem with his "turkey neck" -- too much loose skin.  It was removed by Dr. Nazim and now I look better and can dress with shirt and tie.  I recommend without reservation.

resp.text: Thank you so much. Its genuinely nice people like yourself that make practicing in Montgomery a joy!

name: Daryl Jackson
text: Awesome experience! Quick, efficient, and friendly. Plenty of COVID precautions, not over bearing tho. Great folks!

resp.text: Thank Mr. Jackson. The kind words are much appreciated!

name: Jasmine Abner
text: My experience was great! The facility and staff are beyond measure and they made me very comfortable. The procedure went well and Dr. Jackson is amazing! I would totally recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you Jasmine for the kind words. Dr. Jackson and the whole team are thrilled to hear you had a great experience!

name: Hailey Green
text:
Hands down will recommend anyone to Alabama Surgical Arts. I wasn’t able to catch everyone’s name, a little out of it after my procedure, but I did catch a few! Thank you Jennifer for going over every detail on the phone, Kayla checking me in, and Dr. Jackson for performing an awesome surgery! He even called to check on me after everything! The whole staff is top notch!

Also, I would like to add the building is beautiful. My mom recorded me calling the office rich and commenting on the smell of the office, after leaving lol.

resp.text: Thank you Hailey. We try hard to excel at all the things you mentioned and happy it shows!

name: James Duckett
text: Very professional they had great bedside manner there was not to long of a wait I thought overall they were great.

name: Robbie Oliver
text: Highly recommend.Dr.Nizam and his staff are very professional and thank you for calling and checking in on me after my procedure.The office is clean and beautiful.

name: Steve Wilson
text: Had to have oral surgery and was delighted with the whole experience. The stall are great and Dr Nizam did a fantastic job. Absolutely no pain! Highly recommend them

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Wilson. Post operative pain management is something we feel is very important and something we focus on and allows us to differentiate ourselves!

name: Armando Fernandez
text:
Amazing would be an understatement
Words that come to mind ,caring, knowledgeable, talented , there are not enough adjectives.
I’m am a cosmetic, implant dentist with offices on Madison Ave ,NYC and northern N.J.  And yes there are thousands of plastic surgeons within a mile of my offices. The results I see from other surgeons, did not impress me.
Sami’s results are nothing shy of amazing!
But as we all know , when it comes to a doctor it’s not what they know ,but how much they care. Sami and Lily ,care.
Don’t walk ,run to Alabama Surgical ARTS

resp.text: Flattered. That means a lot and it is always our pleasure. Can't wait to see you again!

name: Douglas Mitchell
text: Thanks Dr Nizam. You and your team was excellent.

resp.text: Anytime. Glad we could help!

name: Nichole Thompson
text: The service and professionalism were both top notch during what could have been a really scary experience. Dr. Jackson and his team eased my concerns and my procedure went well.

resp.text: We are so happy we could make your experience as comforting as possible!

name: Megan Campbell
text: Everyone at ASA is just fantastic! Everyone from the front desk to the med spa is just wonderful. They are so patient with me; explaining procedures in depth and answering ALL my many many questions.  I was so nervous (but excited) to consider any cosmetic procedure.  Now I wont see anyone but Lily and Dr. Nizam. They are simply the best. Their kindness and professionalism is second to none.   I cant reccomend them enough.!

resp.text: Thank you. Feedback like this means a lot. We love patient's whom are a joy to work with like yourself and are always willing to explain every option (downtime, expected result, etc.).

name: Ashley Barganier
text: The team at Alabama Surgical Arts is professional and warm.  They make you feel at ease from the moment you walk into the office. I had a great experience with them and I am looking forward to future visits. Their facials are amazing!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words! Paige our aesthetician is one of a kind and we are so happy to have her!

name: V Huff
text: I am so thankful that they have located in Montgomery. Everyone in the practice is caring and helpful, not to mention extremely skilled.  Whatever comes up they work with you to get it resolved. All I can say is thank you and please don’t leave.

resp.text: Its always a pleasure having patients who are as kind as yourself. Thanks for the great feedback!

name: Debra
text: I had my eyebrows and eyeliner done by Lily. This was life changing for me! I was nervous about the pain but they put numbing cream on me and it was very easy to do. Everyone made me comfortable and calm. Very friendly staff and an amazingly beautiful office! I will be back for more services.

resp.text: Thank you so much . Lily has spent extensive time training not only in permanent cosmetics, but also as a physician assistant. This allows her the ability to provide treatment in a pain free sterile manner.

name: Melanah Poole
text: What a wonderful organization! Everyone was so friendly, and Dr. Nizam made the consult and procedure seem effortless. I even appreciated the follow up call from Dr. Nizam to see how I was recovering. The office environment is excellent, and everyone I interacted with was genuinely kind and caring. Cant recommend this place enough!

resp.text: We really appreciate the kind words and can't thank you enough. It is great people like yourself that make coming to work worth it!

name: Dr. Daniel Hudson
text: Dr. and Lily NIzam, PA-C, are both so professional and the practice is beautiful. They take the time to listen and talk with you and don’t mind answering questions. The quality of their treatment is top notch and my wife and I recommend them to all of our friends and family. Sincerely, Dr. Daniel Hudson, DMD

resp.text: Thank you so much Dr. Hudson. We think the world of you and your wife and can confidently recommend anyone looking for a dentist in the Luverne area to see you as their dentist. Congrats on the move!

name: Jessie Williams
text:
I visited ASA twice. First time was a consultation with Dr. Sami Nizam and the second was to have several teeth extracted, both top wisdom teeth and a few old crowns that could not be saved. Dr. Nizam is phenomenal! The whole ASA team is amazing! I have dentophobia because of my childhood dentist and they all made me feel very relaxed and calm from the get go.
The day of my surgery, the assistants were so sweet and kind. They had plenty of COVID precautions, as well, so 2 thumbs up! I have had NO pain since my surgery. The bleeding stopped within a few hours and I was able to enjoy some soup later on. My face is a bit puffy, but not as much as I thought I'd swell. The night after my surgery, Dr. Nizam called to check in on me to make sure I was alright. I have stitches in my mouth, but they're not bothersome. He really is an amazing surgeon. Everything took less than an hour. I highly recommend going to Alabama Surgical Arts. Overall, positive experience and they helped me overcome my dentophobia. Thank you Alabama Surgical Arts and Dr. Nizam!!

resp.text: Dentophobia be gone! It was our pleasure.

name: Teresa Knight
text: Dr. Sami Nizam and his staff were absolutely amazing today! They are very professional,  and very personable.  From the time things were scheduled over the phone, the staff took the time to answer all of my questions and that I was completely comfortable with everything going into the procedure.  Once we were actually in the room setting up for the procedure,  the doctor and his staff made sure that I was completely at ease before getting anything started.  Dr. Nizam did a fabulous job placing my IV .... quick and no pain  whatsoever! When I woke everything was explained to me that needed to be followed post surgery.  If anyone needs an oral surgeon,  I would highly recommend seeing Dr. Sami Nizam and his amazing staff!!

resp.text: Thanks for the input. Everything you mentioned are what we try to accomplish. Happy is shows!

name: Brian Edwards
text: Very knowledgeable, experienced, friendly staff did a great job with my dental implant surgery.

resp.text: Thanks we really appreciate it. Always a pleasure!

name: Velvet Brantley
text:
I visited ASA twice and each time the clerks were warm and welcoming. Excellent customer service. The first vist I had 12 teeth removed , got home at 12p and the bleeding had stopped  by 2p and I was enjoying potato soup. I only took one pain pill as a precaution. Around 6pm Dr Sami called just as he said he would to check on me. The next visit was a year later and nothing about the service or my care changed. I was put under by Dr Sami, with ease left there with stitches in my gum; again very little discomfort my procedure started at 315p I was home by 430p and wide awake by 530p, I took 2 tylenols , had some soup, it was a good day. Dr.Sami called around 6 like clockwork to check on me. He's  really a very nice person and allows  time to ask questions and I love that and when time permits he'll engage in a bit of small talk and his mannerisms is what I find missing and what I miss a lot in some caregivers today. I'm glad he makes you feel like you matter and you're his patient and he's going to take the best care of you.  Yes, I'm a bit long winded but I just want to give Dr Sami and his team the credit they so deserved and
I woke up to a great morning. Thank you Dr.Sami and ASA ❤🌞

resp.text: Thank you so very much. We really try hard to do everything you just put into writing. It was a pleasure. Hope you have a great rest of the week and holiday weekend!

name: Heejin Yi
text:
Dr. Nizam is the best there is.
The staffs are very friendly yet professional.
Dr Nizam is such a perfectionist in terms of his work for patient’s complete satisfaction .
I would highly recommend Dr. Nizam to anyone .

resp.text: Thank you so much we really appreciate the positive feedback and happy our commitment to achieving the best shows through!

name: Kelly
text: Absolutely amazing!! Great staff, facility, and services. I have been using their skincare products for the past few months and have seen such a difference in my skin. So thankful I found Alabama Surgical Arts!

resp.text: Thank you we try to stock a wide variety of medical grade skin care and love tailoring treatments that are personalized to help achieve your goals!

name: Mary Wendling
text: Good products Lillie not very friendly, cold. Dr seem to careless about what I wanted, not impressed. The person that worked in the office the scheduler was great.

resp.text: Sorry to hear you had a bad experience. We truly care about our patients and if we feel we can't get the results people are looking for we will defer treatment. Thanks for the feedback!

name: Marissa Bailey
text: They are always super friendly, fast, and take great care of you with no worries!!!! Dr. Nizam is the best

resp.text: Thank you so much. Means the world to us!

name: Marilyn Law
text: Dr. Nizam and all the team were just the best.  They just get your situation taken care of and always available for you.  One of the few doctors that check on you later in the evening to make sure all is well.  Very impressed.  The whole team are amazing.

resp.text: Thanks! We believe the patient/surgeon relationship is of the utmost importance and being available 24/7 is an integral part of insuring the best outcomes.

name: rhonda mincey
text: Alabama Surgical Arts took great care of me! I was able to get in quickly to see Dr. Nizam and was able to be worked in a few days early for my procedure due to some discomfort. The staff is very professional and Dr. Nizam has a wonderful chairside manner!

resp.text: Thank you so much Rhonda. We try our hardest to have a relaxed, caring, safe environment!

name: Kendall Reese
text: The staff are very friendly and helpful and they will call and check on you after you had surgery

resp.text: Good outcomes are a top priority and calling to check in is just one of the ways we insure this!

name: Amber M
text: The ASA office is beautiful! Lily and Dr. Nizam are extremely talented and know how to make you feel welcome. This is the best place to go in Montgomery!

name: Amy Jackson
text: I had a wonderful experience at Alabama Surgical Arts and love my results.  The staff was friendly, compassionate, and highly skilled.  I definitely recommend it!

name: Latonya Dees
text: I was very  pleased with staff ,they was kind and caring highly recommend ..

name: Michael King
text: If I could give more stars I would...great facility,    sterile, and very professional. The staff couldn’t have been more accommodating and helpful in every aspect. resp.text: Thank you Mr. King we love the positive feedback!

name: pamela Motes
text: Had a very good experience. Had my surgery yesterday and I am up and at work today after being out of work for a week.. thank you so much for everything yall do😁

name: Tyler Whittington
text: Dr. Nizam and his wife Lily are great! They always listen to what the patient is requesting, and help them achieve their results in a safe and effective manner. They make sure that the patient understands the pathology behind the treatment and what to expect afterwards! I would highly recommend them!

resp.text: This is exactly what we try to do thank you for the recognition. Surgical or non surgical we truly believe in educating, informing, and giving the best options based of off a multitude of factors. It helps when everyone is on the same page!

name: Nikita Jones
text: ASA is AMAZING! I somehow screwed up with my oral surgical appointment time and was 1 hour and 15 minutes late. The front desk reassured me that it was fine and was very nice. Dr. Nizam and surgical staff was so down to earth and kind. I was nervous when I got to the back but the he and the staff helped calm me down.  Dr. Nizam completed the tooth extraction and called that evening just to check on me. NEVER had a doctor to do that! I will definitely recommend Dr. Nizam and his staff! Great place! Great people!

resp.text: Thank you we are happy we could get it done for you. Thanks for doing your best to get here!

name: Ricky Nixon
text: Amazing staff! Dr. Nizam is the best! Passionate about his patients. Had to call him on a holiday and he responded right away and answered all my questions. Would recommend Alabama Surgical Arts to everyone!

name: Sheila Shelley
text:
Dr. Nizam and his staff have been excellent! From the evaluation to surgery and then follow up, everyone has just been so kind.

name: Narrae Allen
text:
Husband was sent here to have all of his wisdom teeth removed at once to avoid infection. The office is very nice, VERY efficient (we were in an out within an hour), and the Dr. himself seems attentive, and even called to check in on us that evening. My problem is with the post-op info - or lack thereof - from the nurse who helped my husband to the car.

She handed me a single sheet that mostly covered medication schedules and dietary restrictions, a pack of gauze, and 4 prescriptions. I have no knowledge of how to care for oral postop things, but my mom's a nurse so i know these things can go smoothly or horribly depending on the patient's choices after surgery - behavior that is usually informed by the advise of medical staff, since the general populace is presumably ignorant (safest assumption). I asked if I needed to replace the gauze as soon as we got home, and was about to ask what all he needed to avoid doing. The nurse quickly said, cordially but also sharply such that she cut me off before i could ask, "everything you need to know is written on this sheet" and told me to call if I had questions. Well, long story short he ended up using a straw and doing a few other things I had no idea he wasn't supposed to, because i didn't //know// those were things i needed to ask about, and the sheet made no mention of any of them. I am now unsure how much of his pain is a natural consequence, and how much is our fault. So now we're keeping an eye on, questioning every symptom, which is stressful for both of us. I acknowledge our fault herein but really feel that this all could have been avoided had we been more informed  about restrictions at discharge

resp.text: I am truthfully sorry you feel you were not given explicit instructions. We try to explain every step of the procedure in detail. I personally call every patient to ask if there are any questions the night of surgery. My personal cell phone is on your post op instructions as well. If you have any questions feel free to call me 24 hours a day. I can be available tomorrow morning if you would like me to take a look. The recommended pain control strategies with maximum dosages are listed on the post op instructions sheet if needed. Hope all is well.  -Dr. Nizam

Following the New Year's holiday in which I had experienced intense pain and huge swelling in my jaw, Dr. Nazim worked me in early Friday morning, having never been his patient. His staff promptly x-rayed the affected area and in no time Dr Nazim was examining me and diagnosing the problem. I was scheduled for surgery that afternoon ( since I had not fasted) and before 2:00 in the afternoon,  I was on the road to recovery and relief. Dr. Nazim emphasized, as I left the office, that I could call his cell at anytime. I hesitated to bother him by phone with an issue on Saturday morning so instead chose to text him with a question. Almost immediately he  returned my text with a  phone call and we discussed the problem.
I am forever in debt to the care provided  by the highly professional staff at Alabama Surgical Arts....Thank you  Dr. Nazim and staff.

name: Kerri Krilla
text: For over 20 years I suffered from periodontal disease and was a patient of a well respected Periodontal specialist in Philadelphia. During that time, the intent was to keep my teeth and gums as healthy as possible. Regularly scheduled deep cleaning worked. However, my doctor retired and the new staff had different ideas. The regularly scheduled deep cleaning was no longer an option, and within a couple of years my teeth deteriorated to the point where it was embarrassing to even smile. The new staff recommended extractions, at first only a few teeth. Ultimately, they planned to extract all my teeth and do implants. I agreed to have the first three teeth extracted. That was the beginning of a horrible time for me. After the extractions I bled profusely and was in a lot of pain. For two weeks I continued to bleed on and off. I was frightened ,I could not eat, and I was miserable. As time passed it didn't get much better, and I was not myself, as I was normally very outgoing and talkative, but now became very uncomfortable around people. The staff then recommended extracting the rest of my teeth and doing implants. But I was afraid of what might happen after the last experience. I thought, "if I bled so profusely from 3 extractions, how would my body react to all my teeth being extracted". The thoughts going through my head were all scary and uncertain. I sought out other opinions, but did not have a good feeling with anyone. Finally, in late 2016, I met with Dr. Sam Nizam. When we met, I immediately felt the connection, and I was comfortable. Dr. Sam listened to all my concerns attentively. I knew the qualities in a doctor that I was looking for and Dr. Sam had all of them. Dr. Sam sat me down and explained step by step what he recommended and how the procedures would be done. He was so calm and confident, and did not sugar coat anything. He explained that I needed 26 extractions, and why. He explained that I needed bone grafting for the implants to take, where he would need to do the grafting, and why. He explained that I needed a sinus lift, and where and why. Also, he showed me visually on the computer and pointed out exactly where my implants would be placed, to have the best chance of success. He explained how all procedures would be done at the same time. I was still nervous about the whole process, but I had total confidence in Dr. Sam and agreed to schedule it as soon as possible. It was February, 2018. I was in surgery for 5 1/2 hours. He performed all the work that he had explained to me. I went home, knowing I was in good hands and that I was going to be fine. But I was just a little nervous, thinking I might bleed. Dr. Sam prescribed pain killers, which I took that night and went to sleep. I awoke after a peaceful night sleep. My bleeding was the size of a dime!. I had minimal pain. I stopped taking the pain killers. I went back for a follow up. Dr. Sam was pleased with the results and so was I. No pain, no bleeding, the implants (all 11 of them) all took. I now have new teeth. I can smile again. I can speak without fear and embarrassment. At my daughter's wedding I was able to proudly smile and laugh all night! Dr. Sam gave me my life back! I am myself again! Thank you!! I will always be grateful to Dr. Sam for the incredible work he did, that now gives me the chance to enjoy life as I had not been able to do for so long. If I ever have a problem, even though I now live many states away in New Jersey, I would not hesitate to make the trip. I recommend Dr. Sam highly . He has been blessed with a tremendous talent and gift to help people. I wish him all the best,and pray that his success helps thousands more like me in the future. - Linda K

text: the actual surgery was fine. the nurses were good. the rest were rude impatient and unempathetic. one of the staff (i dont know which) told my gf to quit crying after she woke up from surgery and was left alone in a room for 15 mins. They also lied abbout their own competence saying it would take 30mins i waited for  hours. Go to uab instead if you can

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts, Sam. We are sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expectations and would like to learn more about what your concerns are... we do constantly monitor our patients while in surgical recovery both with video surveillance and with surgical assistants present... and we do often observe a wide range of emotions in our patients as their anesthesia is wearing off.... but never do we expect to hear that our team is unsympathetic or rude. Can you please reach out to our Practice Administrator, Gail, so she can address your complaints? Call us any time, we look forward to speaking with you.

name: Karen Jones
text: They were very good with hygiene and COVID risks   I did not have any problems with the extractions. I must not have woke up fast enough because they did chest bone hits to wake me up. My chest was sore for days

name: Jennifer Holzner
text:
DO NOT GO HERE

My boyfriend had work done here upon the recommendation of my dentist (whom I love) When we arrived they seemed very confused as to which teeth they were supposed to be pulling. I asked if they should call the dentist to double check and they said no, by looking at the x-rays it was pretty common sense as to what needed to be done. The procedure was quick, but that is not saying much considering the entire office was clearly in a rush which made more sense after the receptionist informed me they were trying to leave at noon that day. I got my boyfriend home and about an hour later he went to remove his gauze and noticed they had FORGOTTEN TO REMOVE TWO OF HIS TEETH. We had to go back and thankfully we had about 20 min to spare before they closed. Not once did they say out loud they forgot anything, they just quietly whisked him back and seemed to want to keep everything hush hush (again, trying to leave early). They never even apologized to us for the MAJOR inconvenience of having to be put out again, to have another surgery after the one he had an hour ago.

After 2 months of waiting, any time I called to inquire about our bill or to get a break down everyone was extremely rude. Transferring me without stating what they were doing, getting an attitude over the phone. Not to mention I never once EVER got a call back from a voicemail I left, I always had to call back the next morning.

Anyways, this place sucks. They seem fancy and like a well oiled machine but you are not their priority, believe me. Full of crotchety old ladies who pass the buck.

name: Mrs Lockett
text: Excellent service very professional yet with a family vibe i was nervous because my son needed  surgery to remove a four of his wisdom teeth not to mention the nervousness from COVID-19 be a constant an very real threat once we got into the area for the consultation i was instantly put at easy with how knowledgeable friendly and welcoming the staff were 💕

resp.text: Thanks Tiffany for your kind words! We're happy we could put your mind at ease! Thanks for your trust, we're grateful for amazing parents like you.

text: Absolutely, a terrible experience, my thirteen year old daughter had her wisdom teeth surgically removed by Dr. Smith, at Clark & Holmes in Birmingham, Alabama today. Specifically,  Miala, one of the post op care givers to my child, she was rude, and it was obvious there was not one stitch of care or passion for her occupation. She spoke to my daughter like she was a dog. While loading my daughter in the car she thought that I was taking a picture of her at the vehicle and spoke to me like a dog, stating she didn’t want to be in the photo, my camera was not even on. I asked for her name and she never answered and kept on walking. I called the front desk and spoke with Lisa in HR. If people conduct themselves in this manner providing a service to patrons then they at least should put on an act. She has absolutely no bedside manner and a terrible demeanor with no business working in this field with patients after they’ve woken up from a medical procedure especially with children. Extremely unprofessional not what I expected from a well recommended facility. I HAVE TO RECOMMEND GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!

will not recommending anyone 😟😡

My personal experience has shown that Dr. Teichmiller is extremely knowledgeable, skillful and precise and I would go to no one else.

name: Tracey Walker
text: This dental office didn’t Inform me there was a $97 initial consultation fee before they took me through all the paperwork and the informational tour of the office. I felt like I was at a hard sell timeshare experience. The dentist was very professional but the practice of not informing a new patient of charges that are unexpected is unprofessional. I have never paid any money with my dental insurance provider  and nor could they tell me how much insurance would pay if I visited for another appointment so I would recommend you check first because they aren’t forthcoming with costs nor insurance but they will offer all the fluff of cookies baked daily, and blankets on your lap, MS Alabama beauty queen provider ect. Which personally I would prefer to keep my $97 than have all the fluff.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We did forget to tell you of the first visit fee, and we take full responsibility for that. It was an error on our part, and definitely not how we like to run our practice. We regret any inconvenience and frustration this caused. We have subsequently filed this with your insurance, and anticipate this will be reimbursed. Thank you, and please let us know if you have further questions or concerns.

Truly confident and experienced dental staff that is top notch. As for Dr. Teichmiller, she is a gentle angel who I will recommend to everyone I see. I’m blessed to have found them.

They answered all of my questions and made my choice an easy one. ! have NEVER experienced such a “spa” service in dental care. I’ll be back forever!

name: Dustin Bates
text: So I had a terrible mouth.  With an abscessed broken molar.  I hadn't been to the dentist in 10 year or more.  My last experience was a terrible one.  I mean I know I haven't taken care of them.  Not once did the office make me feel bad or lecture me.  They were kind and gentle and made the process as comfortable as removing a tooth could possibly be.  I was terrified of having work done.  I was only there "because I had to be." I Even told them that.   Well not only is the team amazing here.  But Dr Barnes who removed my tooth made it an easy and smooth process.  At no point in the procedure did I hurt nearly as bad as I had the morning prior.  It literally blew my mind how little pain and discomfort, I felt during the process.  Major kudos to this team.  I'm not scared to go back.  Heck I'm kinda looking forward to it.  Can't wait to have a good smile and feel confident to show off my teeth again.  Oh and it was very very affordable.  Now looking back it seems silly how big a nightmare I thought it was going to be compared to how it really was.  Don't put it off!!!  Do it today with this team.  You won't regret it.  Excellent job!

name: Patresa Hubbard
text: This is the dentist god, I can’t say this about any other dentist. The courtesy and professionalism is over the top. I’m not a fan of the dentist, but all my anxiety went away after meeting Dr. Stephanie, she is simply amazing .The entire staff made it a easy transition to do business with them. Efficient, knowledgeable, and everything is explained to your understanding. Thank you all for making me feel comfortable.

text: LOVE Dr Stephanie Teichmiller and Mallory! From the very first phone call to schedule an appointment to the consultation, I have never felt more relaxed and truly cared for! So happy to begin this journey to a healthy smile!

name: Rebecca Garrett
text: Dr. Stephanie and her staff are the freaking bomb!!! I drove from Atlanta and it was worth every mile!! Visiting this office is an “experience” from the time you walk in the door until the time you leave!! I have never been treated so nicely!! I was offered so many goodies from the freebies to the snacks (not to mention the personalized note with my name on it). I was also given a tour of the office and received full details on the technology and different procedures offered in the office. Dr. Stephanie met with me prior to getting down to business and asked all the important questions. It’s very obvious she has a passion for what she does. She took it a step further and blocked out some time for me considering I drove in from Atlanta. She wanted to ensure we made the most of our time together and our visit today. Let’s just say I was blown away!! Best dentist office visit ever, hands down!!!! I wish I could click more than just 5 stars!! ❤️ S/N for my next consult she even suggested a FaceTime visit to confirm everything, so I wouldn’t have to drive back and forth!!! #PatientForLife😁😁

text: Great experience! Everyone is extremely professional and has a caring spirit!

name: Freddie Jones
text:
Initial call last week I was told, over the phone, that initial exam was $37 and I DID NOT have to pay up front and my insurance would be billed. I was very specific when I asked the question. At check out, true enough, I paid $37 but in order to schedule my next 2 appointments I had to pay $130. What part of having to pay $130 to schedule my next 2 appointments is not paying up front when that's the exact question I asked when I called initially.

So why a 3 and not 1? Very detailed consultation/expectations and they give you snacks and a water ! 😂

resp.text: Hi Freddie and thanks for the feedback. We are pleased to hear you are happy with the care you received in our office and we enjoyed serving you! As we shared with you on the phone, the first New Patient appointment is not “prepaid.” As for the second appointment, all new patients prepay. We apologize for any miscommunication regarding this. It is important to Dr. Teichmiller and the rest of the team that we are communicating effectively with our patients and we will take this opportunity to review our communication with patients regarding this. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you at your next visit!

text: Scheduling coordinator is not friendly nor understanding.  Said I would be charged $125.00 for comprehensive first exam because I missed my first appointment.  I was going to be a new patient and they advertised initial exam as "Free" to new patients.  If you go to their website they are chargeing $49 for new patient consult.  Pam sent me several emails to try get me to reschedule an appointment just to drop that $125 bomb on me.  Looks like I'm going to pay $125 for no exam, and  no consult.  REAL FRIENDLY

resp.text: Hi Daron. We are sorry you feel frustrated with your experience. In order to give our patients the best care possible we reserve time with the dentist for them and we then ask them to do their part by honoring their appointment. When the appointment is confirmed that day and they don’t show up (as happened in this case), we ask them to prepay the $125 to show their commitment to honor their next appointment. We hope that helps clarify things for you and we encourage you to reach out to us if you have additional questions. Thank you.

resp.text: Derrick, caring for you and your family is easy!  Your desire to have 'the best' encourages us to be 'our best' for you!  Loving your new smile!!

text:
For most of my life I have been embarrassed by the appearance of my teeth in pictures and when smiling.  I have been aware of Dr. Teichmiller's reputation for her skill, and priority to offer the latest in options that would be best for me.
Upon evaluation, she accessed my needs and customized a plan for the work I needed.  I will admit I was concerned regarding the discomfort I might be dealing with due to the extensive nature of my work.  To my relief and surprise, I was never in pain during the whole process.  My procedures were always treated with care and she was keenly aware of my comfort.
Today, I have beautiful teeth that I am not only proud of but I'm always happy to smile and share Dr. Stephanie Teichmillers talent for creating my bright and much more youthful smile.  I have been told I even look younger.  Who doesn't love that?
Thank you Dr. Stephanie Teichmiller for all you have done to give me a reason to SMILE!

text: Great office, provides excellent patient care.

name: B A Buckland
text: Very intelligent, thoughtful and caring. Congenial and authentic. Knows how to do his job. Would recommend him to anyone needing a peridontist or implants.

name: Antonio Md
text: Really nice and friendly staff. Book ahead of time because appointments full quickly!

name: Ross Isbell
text: Our practice often refers patients to Dr. Sims and team and they always are thankful for a great experience!

name: Carolyn Bryant
text: My dentist sent me to Dr. Kevin Sims for dental implants. Dr. Sims and team made welcome immediately. He was glad to answer all my questions and explain procedures so that I could understand him. I have several visits more before I am through, but I am very impressed with him and the clinic as a whole. I anticipate having a fabulous outcome and a beautiful smile.

name: Frank Thacker
text: I have used many dentist in my 64yrs. Dr. Sims has pleased me more than any other. The implants are AWESOME and the procedure was relatively pain free... The fact that He thought of my procedure and personally called me at home just to check meant a lot to me... I believe He takes every patients procedure personally and truly cares for their well being.... Thank You Dr. Sims for making my life better....

name: Barry Harrison
text: Dr. Sims and his staff are amazing! From the first time I called , they were nothing but nice. I worked with them for almost a year from a bone graft to dental implants. After my surgeries Dr. Sims called me himself to check on me. Ginny was usually his dental assistant and was always so nice and caring !  The dental implants have changed my life ! I highly recommend DR. Sims to anyone !

name: Douglas Duet
text: Amazing. Courteous, professional and super friendly

name: Lindy McCullers Carmichael
text: The whole team is fabulous!
